programme.title: Grey's Anatomy
Uvod u anatomiju
programme.desc:
Grey's Anatomy: Created by Shonda Rhimes. With Ellen Pompeo, Chandra Wilson, James Pickens Jr., Justin Chambers. A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA2Mjk0N2MtNGY0Mi00ZWFjLTkxODEtZDFjNDg4ZDliMGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzAzNTY3MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cchase"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"With "Anatomy," ABC Scores A Triple!","reviewBody":"The Network From Nowhere really knocked me for a loop by smacking the viewing audience upside its collective head with THREE strong series that came out winners: "Desperate Housewives" and "LOST" being the first two.

Now that we are well into the second season for both of those, and their story arcs are looking a little 'iffy', it's the third and most surprising contender, "Grey's Anatomy", that looks to be the strongest of the bunch. As the follow-up riding on "Housewives'" coattails, I was ready to dismiss it outright as "Ally McBeal in hospital scrubs." But not having much else to watch in that time slot, I decided to give it a try, and was I pleasantly shocked! Though there ARE some moments where the principal characters come off as self-centered, neurotic and at times downright eccentric, it never reached the level of absurdity that "Ally" often did, and thank God for that! Ellen Pompeo as Dr. Meredith Grey comes off as likable and probably more self-aware and introspective than self-absorbed and scatterbrained, though there are moments you do want to reach into the screen and give her a good shaking.

And good call on the ensemble casting! You really have to give props to any show that FINALLY figures out how to effectively showcase the sweet-and-sour charms of Sandra Oh, who was good enough to elevate a sow's ear of a show like "Arli$$," if not to save it. And not to mention give assorted actors who have all been great in projects not up to their talents, the chance to really shine in some very well-written roles, and I want to single out Katherine Heigl, Justin Chambers, Chandra Wilson and especially T.R. Knight as George, who is really coming into his own as this season progresses.

Not to snub Isaiah Washington, James Pickens, Jr., Kate Walsh or the so-hot-it's-criminal Patrick Dempsey. Seasoned vets all, it's just good to see them all land in a nice place where they can do great work with some sense of job security. (WE HOPE.) 

Realistic enough to be accessible but not a turn-off, and whimsically light enough at other times without straying into "Stefan-the-Frog" territory, (are you listening, David Kelley?), "Grey's" should remain as a dependable Sunday night staple as long as creator/producer Shonda Rhimes and her crew are able to continue to strike that balance, and keep its newfound audience interested and entertained with the trials, tribulations and trysts of the staff at Seattle Grace Hospital."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":282886,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

I thought it was OK, not great but OK easy to watch. Now is that not what a kids film should be? Too many people out there think they are experts, just relax man and watch the movie.

Instead of writing crap about every film, it's unfair as myself as a parent checked the reviews for this. I am pleased I ignored them as I have my suspicions about a lot of these reviewers. This is a long line now in poor reviews which turn out to be decent movies. Astérix and Obélix go to Egypt to help architect Numérobis who is building a palace for Cleopatra." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0250223/","name":"Astérix & Obélix: Mission Cléopâtre","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2Q3NmUzNjAtM2VjMS00MGU3LWE4YjEtZTM1NDM0YTdlOWRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODIyOTEyMzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Astérix and Obélix go to Egypt to help architect Numérobis who is building a palace for Cleopatra.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0250223/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"soringax"},"dateCreated":"2002-02-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Exclusively French, but Monica is awesome","reviewBody":"You cannot be seeing the same movie if you didn't grow up in France (or spent at least 10 years there, like me). I don't know if it will ever make it outside French cultural borders (I include Belgium and Luxembourg here). You cannot translate its kind of fun - every name is joke (how many people outside Paris would understand the pun in "Couloirdebus", the name of one of the Roman legionnaires ?). However Monica Bel(l?)ucci is so beautiful, I almost forgot to breathe when I saw her.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51429,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2002-01-30","keywords":"architect,based on comic book,egypt,druid,cleopatra","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1979890201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YyNTIxYzAtYzg2Yi00YzAyLThmYWEtOGQwYWJmZWU4MjM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YyNTIxYzAtYzg2Yi00YzAyLThmYWEtOGQwYWJmZWU4MjM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000367/","name":"Gérard Depardieu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002010/","name":"Christian Clavier"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0213354/","name":"Jamel Debbouze"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149260/","name":"Alain Chabat"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090290/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049807/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0331453/","name":"René Goscinny"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0879853/","name":"Albert Uderzo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149260/","name":"Alain Chabat"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Shrek the Third
Shrek Treći
programme.desc: Shrek the Third: Directed by Chris Miller, Raman Hui. With Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, Antonio Banderas. Reluctantly designated as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away, Shrek hatches a plan to install the rebellious Artie as the new king while Princess Fiona tries to fend off a coup d'état by the jilted Prince Charming." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0413267/","name":"Shrek the Third","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyMjc3ODk2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjY0MjEzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Reluctantly designated as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away, Shrek hatches a plan to install the rebellious Artie as the new king while Princess Fiona tries to fend off a coup d'état by the jilted Prince Charming.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413267/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Lejink"},"dateCreated":"2008-08-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ogre and out...?","reviewBody":"It took me a while to catch up with the third edition of the money-spinning "Shrek" franchise and I was vaguely aware of a less than positive critical, if not popular response, to it but was pleasantly surprised with the product on show. Okay, it's pick-your-cliché from "the law of diminishing returns", "familiarity breeding contempt" and "too much of a good thing", but hey, I still like these characters and whilst I now would doubt whether the characters and situations can be developed any further at least on the big-screen, it's certainly been one of the better trilogies of recent years. The graphics and animations are as before so good as to make you think you're wearing 3D spex and the story, while contrived (I'm not quite sure how Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table actually qualify as classic children's fairy-tale or cartoon favourites) shares the laughs around before winding up at the by now familiar happy-ending finish with a romp-out to a classic track from yesteryear, this time Sly Stone's funk-tastic "Thank you...". Best moments are the Gingerbread Man's life flashing before him in a (threatened) pre-death moment and the four Disney princesses (plus one ugly step-sister!) giving it some attitude as they find liberation (even burning a bra symbolically, in the process). Best line, as usual, goes to Eddie Murphy's Donkey "I'm being attacked by an ogre - with issues!". There aren't as many outright belly-laughs as in the peerless first "Shrek", you feel that Shrek and Fiona are more bit-players in their own movie (I can't believe I'm humanising animated characters!) and occasionally you're made to wait for the next really good joke (Eric Idle's Merlin and Justin Timberlake's Arthur don't exactly leap off the page/screen either), so yes, this outing of the not-so-jolly green giant, may not be as good as its predecessors but that's down to the lack of surprise at revisiting these stock characters and, heck, they were mighty good predecessors!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":294534,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2007-06-06","keywords":"shrek,king,puss in boots,donkey,kingdom","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Shrek the programme.title: Cars
Auti
programme.desc: Cars: Directed by John Lasseter, Joe Ranft. With Owen Wilson, Paul Newman, Bonnie Hunt, Larry the Cable Guy. A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ahuffman_2000"},"dateCreated":"2006-05-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar and Disney did it again!","reviewBody":"Without giving away any of the story, here's my take. I attended the premiere of CARS at LMS on Friday, May 26. True to Disney form, the premiere itself was spectacular. Four giant screens, live entertainment,lots of fireworks, great inclusion of military personnel, and as good of a red carpet as you can do with chain link fenced areas... This movie rates right in the middle of Pixar releases for me. I place it above Monsters Inc, A Bug's Life and Toy Story 2, but not as good as the "original", the best ever, Toy Story, and The Incredibles. Everything just looks so real in this movie. The dust stirred up when Lightning drives off, the scenery around Route 66 (well, maybe not those mountains that look like the fins of old cars). Even the shine on the clean cars looks so real. As an adult, I enjoyed the story line. I can't tell you how the kids would like it, as by the time the movie finally started, my kids were asleep. As always, don't leave your seat until all of the credits roll. Sometimes they are some of the funniest clips in the movie! You'll love them this time, as they tie back to prior Pixar movies, in a car sort of way. This is definitely a movie we'll add to the DVD collection. I really hope this movie does well since it's the first release since Disney bought Pixar. Don't go in looking for the action or adult humor of The Incredibles. If you do you'll be disappointed. Just go in looking for the "Disney always has a good moral behind its animated movies" type of movie and you will really enjoy it. Paul Newman and Larry the Cable Guy really have the best characters in the movie. And while John Ratzenberger's character doesn't have a lot of screen time, I really enjoyed him! I'll be going back to see it when it releases in theaters so I can get a better feel for the sound, as it wasn't the best in an outdoor setting. programme.review: --- Actors: Owen Wilson (role=Lightning McQueen), Paul Newman (role=Doc Hudson), Bonnie Hunt (role=Sally Carrera), Larry the Cable Guy (role=Mater), Cheech Marin (role=Ramone), Tony Shalhoub (role=Luigi), Guido Quaroni (role=Guido), Jenifer Lewis (role=Flo), Paul Dooley (role=Sarge), Michael Wallis (role=Sheriff), George Carlin (role=Fillmore), Katherine Helmond (role=Lizzie)

IMDb data; ttnr: 0317219, Title: Cars, --- Description: Cars: Directed by John Lasseter, Joe Ranft. With Owen Wilson, Paul Newman, Bonnie Hunt, Larry the Cable Guy. A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ahuffman_2000","dateCreated":"2006-05-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar and Disney did it again!","reviewBody":"Without giving away any of the story, here's my take. I attended the premiere of CARS at LMS on Friday, May 26. True to Disney form, the premiere itself was spectacular. Four giant screens, live entertainment,lots of fireworks, great inclusion of military personnel, and as good of a red carpet as you can do with chain link fenced areas... This movie rates right in the middle of Pixar releases for me. I place it above Monsters Inc, A Bug's Life and Toy Story 2, but not as good as the "original", the best ever, Toy Story, and The Incredibles. Everything just looks so real in this movie. The dust stirred up when Lightning drives off, the scenery around Route 66 (well, maybe not those mountains that look like the fins of old cars). Even the shine on the clean cars looks so real. As an adult, I enjoyed the story line. I can't tell you how the kids would like it, as by the time the movie finally started, my kids were asleep. As always, don't leave your seat until all of the credits roll. Sometimes they are some of the funniest clips in the movie! You'll love them this time, as they tie back to prior Pixar movies, in a car sort of way. This is definitely a movie we'll add to the DVD collection. I really hope this movie does well since it's the first release since Disney bought Pixar. Don't go in looking for the action or adult humor of The Incredibles. If you do you'll be disappointed. Just go in looking for the "Disney always has a good moral behind its animated movies" type of movie and you will really enjoy it. Paul Newman and Larry the Cable Guy really have the best characters in the movie. And while John Ratzenberger's character doesn't have a lot of screen time, I really enjoyed him! I'll be going back to see it when it releases in theaters so I can get a better feel for the sound, as it wasn't the best in an outdoor setting. In my opinion, it easily beats the other animated movies released over the past year or so.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":393517,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1,"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-09-06","keywords":"car,car movie,route 66,truck,tow truck","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"How the Best Racing Films Raise the Stakes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi365149977","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On this IMDbrief, sponsored by Coca-Cola, we're putting the pedal to the metal on the best racing films of all time.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001372/","name":"Bonnie Hunt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000056/","name":"Paul Newman"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460146/","name":"Jorgen Klubien"],"duration":"PT1H57M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
Bornov ultimatum
programme.desc:
The Bourne Ultimatum: Directed by Paul Greengrass. With Matt Damon, Julia Stiles, David Strathairn, Scott Glenn. Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless C.I.A. official and his Agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0440963/","name":"The Bourne Ultimatum","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGNiNmU2YTMtZmU4OS00MjM0LTlmYWUtMjVlYjAzYjE2N2RjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless C.I.A. official and his Agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0440963/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Listen_to_the_Law"},"dateCreated":"2007-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Smart and Gripping","reviewBody":"The Bourne Ultimatum is the third and final outing for super-spy Jason Bourne, a man who is out to kill the people who made him into a killer. The Bourne series is one of the highest regarded trilogies by critics (Ultimatum has an 85/100 on metacritic.com, meaning it's status is "universal acclaim) and for good reason- the fighting is choreographed very well and the deep story can be very engrossing.

First, I highly advise you watch The Bourne Identity and The Bourne Supremacy, the two fancy-titled prequels to Ultimatum. There may be three different movies, but in reality they are all a continuance of one another: missing one leaves you stranded and confused, just like I was. You will still be about to enjoy the action and fight scenes of Ultimatum if you missed the first two, but then the story will definitely lead to some confusion.

If you were lucky enough to view the prequels to this movie, you probably had a treat watching Bourne take down his enemies and track down the man who screwed him from Supremacy. Jason Bourne is played very well by Matt Damon. Damon does nothing to deserve an Oscar nod, but his work here is good enough to hold it's own. Bourne's adventures take place in many different cities; the cities are all varied enough to keep the movie from becoming bland at times. The agency tracking Bourne takes advantage of every technological tool known to mankind to track him down.

I won't go into detail on the characters because they are continuations off of the first two movies. However, it wouldn't hurt the movie to spell a few things out for the audience- not every viewer is a die-hard movie watcher who can pick up on every little hint about story development. Ultimatum wouldn't have been harmed at all if the story was a little more up front.

It seems most people agree that Ultimatum was a success of a film: the movie opened to $69 million, and -box office total now is up to $216 mil- is currently still going very strongly for a movie that has been in theatres since August 3. It's the best action movie I've seen since Live Free or Die Hard.

Good) Damon is solid but not spectacular, very smart movie Bad) Story is like many others","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":620424,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2007-08-08","keywords":"memory,dark past,flashback,blockbuster,surprise ending","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1183149/","name":"Edgar Ramírez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000260/","name":"Joan Allen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339030/","name":"Paul Greengrass"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0221156/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013175/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006904/","name":"Tony Gilroy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1994243/","name":"Scott Z. programme.title: Glitter
Glitter
programme.desc: Glitter: Directed by Vondie Curtis-Hall. With Mariah Carey, Max Beesley, Da Brat, Tia Texada. A young singer dates a disc jockey who helps her get into the music business, but their relationship become complicated as she ascends to super stardom." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0118589/","name":"Glitter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGJkN2IxNTYtZDE1OS00MWJhLWFhNzItNTZkMjM4OGUzMTE2L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTg3MTc4ODY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young singer dates a disc jockey who helps her get into the music business, but their relationship become complicated as she ascends to super stardom.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0118589/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TYANDSAHONA"},"dateCreated":"2004-10-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Was it that bad? Really?","reviewBody":"Okay, for the record, this was a lousy film. But did it deserve the sort of bombastic universal panning it received? It was not nearly in the league of such absolute bombs as Gigli, Black Dog or anything with Rutger Hauer. It was a formulaic, wish-fulfillment movie worthy of being a Lifetime Special or an ABC Movie of the Week. It sucked, but it wasn't the sort of movie that scars one for life. After all the jokes and hype I was disappointed when I saw this movie on cable this weekend. I was expecting Ishtar. To me, this points up a problem with how our culture reviews movies. Every so often critics, (who are cynical bastards anyway) seem to pick out a movie to practice witty cruelty upon as a sort of mental exercise. Really?","reviewBody":"Okay, for the record, this was a lousy film. But did it deserve the sort of bombastic universal panning it received? It was not nearly in the league of such absolute bombs as Gigli, Black Dog or anything with Rutger Hauer. It was a formulaic, wish-fulfillment movie worthy of being a Lifetime Special or an ABC Movie of the Week. It sucked, but it wasn't the sort of movie that scars one for life. After all the jokes and hype I was disappointed when I saw this movie on cable this weekend. I was expecting Ishtar. To me, this points up a problem with how our culture reviews movies. Every so often critics, (who are cynical bastards anyway) seem to pick out a movie to practice witty cruelty upon as a sort of mental exercise. programme.title: Step Up
Step Up
programme.desc: Step Up: Directed by Anne Fletcher. With Channing Tatum, Jenna Dewan, Damaine Radcliff, De'Shawn Washington. Tyler Gage receives the opportunity of a lifetime after vandalizing a performing arts school, gaining him the chance to earn a scholarship and dance with an up and coming dancer, Nora." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0462590/","name":"Step Up","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODEzMzVhODgtOTc1NS00MmY3LWI3OGUtN2ZjNDEwM2ExZjJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk1Njg5NTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Tyler Gage receives the opportunity of a lifetime after vandalizing a performing arts school, gaining him the chance to earn a scholarship and dance with an up and coming dancer, Nora.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0462590/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"avoisawesome"},"dateCreated":"2006-08-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"step up was GOOD.","reviewBody":"people keep talking about how awful "step up" was, or how it was such a waste of money. but now here are my two cents. it was, in fact, a good movie. the dancing was FABULOUS, and even though the acting could have improved, this movie was nothing short of amazing. the music was catchy and hot, and there was just enough romance in it to make it cute but not gross or sleazy. it had literally EVERYTHING you could ask for in a movie: romance, drama, comedy, and it was even slightly scary at some parts, too. Channing Tatum and Jenna Dewan did a great job. their dancing, along with everyone else's, was phenomenal. when i left the movie, i was actually inspired to be a dancer (even though i never will be.) the main reason people are turning down this movie is because of the acting. sure, the acting could have been better, but this movie was focusing on the DANCING. obviously you have to be a good actor to be in a movie, but the dancing was the main focus of this film. and i personally think the dancing was great. i couldn't ask for it to be better. this movie is definitely worth seeing, whether you're into hip-hop or not.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":115422,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Crime","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2007-02-07","keywords":"title programme.title: Bijes pod kontrolom
programme.desc: Kako Charlie može pomoći svojim pacijentima da se izbore s bijesom kad se i sam mora nositi s različitim ispadima bijesa njegove kćeri tinejdžerice, sarkazmom bivše supruge i drugima? "Bijes pod kontrolom" je hit-komedija s Charliejem Sheenom u ulozi Charlieja, nekonvencionalnog psihijatra čija je specijalnost kontrola bijesa. Nekoć je bio sportaš, no problemi s bijesom prekinuli su mu karijeru.

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
Bornov identitet
programme.desc:
The Bourne Identity: Directed by Doug Liman. With Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen. A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0258463/","name":"The Bourne Identity","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkNGU0ZGMtZjVjNS00NjgyLWEyOWYtZmRmZGQyN2IxZjA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0258463/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CAMACHO-4"},"dateCreated":"2005-10-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the best spy films around","reviewBody":"This story has been done several times in the past, most recently in "A Long Kiss Goodnight". It's also true that Doug Liman and the producers created their own Jason Bourne mythology,since this movie is different in many ways to the book. But the truth is Liman takes an old story and puts a new fast paced spin on it.

Matt Damon stars as the enigmatic assassin who just wants to figure out who he is. As he travels from city to city he's followed by CIA agents who want to dispose of him to save their own jobs. He's helped along the way by Marie played by the brilliant Franka Potente. Together they come face to face with the people that want them dead.

The cast is great and so is the story. IMDb data; ttnr: 0258463, Title: The Bourne Identity, --- Description: The Bourne Identity: Directed by Doug Liman. With Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen. A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0258463/","name":"The Bourne Identity","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkNGU0ZGMtZjVjNS00NjgyLWEyOWYtZmRmZGQyN2IxZjA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0258463/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"CAMACHO-4","dateCreated":"2005-10-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the best spy films around","reviewBody":"This story has been done several times in the past, most recently in "A Long Kiss Goodnight". It's also true that Doug Liman and the producers created their own Jason Bourne mythology,since this movie is different in many ways to the book. But the truth is Liman takes an old story and puts a new fast paced spin on it.

Matt Damon stars as the enigmatic assassin who just wants to figure out who he is. As he travels from city to city he's followed by CIA agents who want to dispose of him to save their own jobs. He's helped along the way by Marie played by the brilliant Franka Potente. Together they come face to face with the people that want them dead.

The cast is great and so is the story. This film should be on everyone's top ten list.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":529574,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-09-25","keywords":"amnesia,secret past,money,assassin,dark past","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Bourne Identity","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi680919321","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGZkYTZjNTctNjkzOS00YjAzLTk5MTgtMGQwYWJiODI5MDNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGZkYTZjNTctNjkzOS00YjAzLTk5MTgtMGQwYWJiODI5MDNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004376/","name":"Franka Potente","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177933/","name":"Chris Cooper"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510731/","name":"Doug Liman"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013175/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035615/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006904/","name":"Tony Gilroy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0380819/","name":"W. programme.title: 50 First Dates
50 prvih poljubaca
programme.desc:
50 First Dates: Directed by Peter Segal. With Adam Sandler, Drew Barrymore, Rob Schneider, Sean Astin. Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams until discovering she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the next day." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0343660/","name":"50 First Dates","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAwMzc4MDgxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNjUwMzE3._V1_.jpg","description":"Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams until discovering she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the next day.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0343660/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gavin6942"},"dateCreated":"2016-01-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Surprisingly Good Sandler Comedy","reviewBody":"Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment up until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams, until he discovers she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the very next day.

At first, I just liked some of the usual humor: the use of spam to make me believe we were really in Hawaii. And also Rob Schneider, who is often the funniest person in Sandler's films. (He is still good here, though perhaps not at his best.) 

I was pleasantly surprised that amidst the stupid humor was an actual story about love and the growing bond of two people. There could have been a variety of "Groundhog Day" jokes. And indeed, there were some. But the character Sandler plays is actually quite sweet. Who knew?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":342634,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2004-05-05","keywords":"hawaii,anterograde amnesia,true love,father daughter relationship,neo screwball comedy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"50 First Dates","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi867434777","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTJlZDIyNzYtY2UyMy00YWRlLWFmZGMtZTEwMjI1NmZkZDEyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTJlZDIyNzYtY2UyMy00YWRlLWFmZGMtZTEwMjI1NmZkZDEyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001191/","name":"Adam Sandler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000106/","name":"Drew Barrymore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001705/","name":"Rob Schneider"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0781842/","name":"Peter Segal"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059609/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017525/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1286500/","name":"George Wing"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Men in Black
Ljudi u crnom
programme.desc:
Men in Black: Directed by Barry Sonnenfeld. With Tommy Lee Jones, Will Smith, Linda Fiorentino, Vincent D'Onofrio. A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119654/","name":"Men in Black","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTlhYTVkMDktYzIyNC00NzlkLTlmN2ItOGEyMWQ4OTA2NDdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119654/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mOVIemAN56"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Funny Sci-Fi. As Good As Ghostbusters.","reviewBody":"As I stated above, Men In Black is just as good as the sci-fi comedies Ghostbusters I and II. But instead of chasing ghost's we're chasing after rogue aliens.

James (Will Smith) is an officer in the NYPD and one of the top officers. After a hard night, James is questioned by his own police force for allegedly killing a suspect who fell off a building. As James insists that the person was acting strangely, Agent K (Tommmy Lee Jones) comes in and takes him out. 

James is welcomed to a secret agency which keeps aliens in check. After a brief examination of his life, James (now Agent J) joins the agency. On his first day, suddenly K and J are on a mission to stop a massive cockroach from destroying Earth and starting a galactic war. 

The chemistry between Smith and Jones is hilarious. Smith has some great comedy scenes especially when he is using his new weapon, the Noisy Crickett and him trying to deliver a baby squid type creature. The aliens are smart, their inventive, and their just plain fun when seeing how they identify themselves and hide their identities. The story is funny and will keep you laughing at almost every scene.

The presentation of aliens as everyday people trying to live normal lives in Manhattan is a lot more fun than the presentation of murderous aliens (Independence Day). Another great part is that the film isn't overblown with special effects of alien explosions and massive battles. Instead comedy and chemistry keeps this top comedy flowing. 

Men In Black. Starring: Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Linda Fiorentino, and Rip Torn.

4 1/2 out of 5 Stars.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":543103,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"1997-07-02","keywords":"alien,pantyhose,superhero,flying saucer,laser gun","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1466737177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTg1MDQ2MzU2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzQ0ODkyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTg1MDQ2MzU2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzQ0ODkyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A streetwise NYPD detective joins a secret organization that polices extraterrestrial affairs on Earth."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000169/","name":"Tommy Lee Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000226/","name":"Will Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000400/","name":"Linda Fiorentino"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001756/","name":"Barry Sonnenfeld"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108321/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0192384/","name":"Lowell Cunningham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004412/","name":"Ed Solomon"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119654/","name":"Men in Black","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTlhYTVkMDktYzIyNC00NzlkLTlmN2ItOGEyMWQ4OTA2NDdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mOVIemAN56","dateCreated":"2005-05-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Funny Sci-Fi. As Good As Ghostbusters.","reviewBody":"As I stated above, Men In Black is just as good as the sci-fi comedies Ghostbusters I and II. But instead of chasing ghost's we're chasing after rogue aliens.

James (Will Smith) is an officer in the NYPD and one of the top officers. After a hard night, James is questioned by his own police force for allegedly killing a suspect who fell off a building. As James insists that the person was acting strangely, Agent K (Tommmy Lee Jones) comes in and takes him out. 

James is welcomed to a secret agency which keeps aliens in check. After a brief examination of his life, James (now Agent J) joins the agency. On his first day, suddenly K and J are on a mission to stop a massive cockroach from destroying Earth and starting a galactic war. 

The chemistry between Smith and Jones is hilarious. Smith has some great comedy scenes especially when he is using his new weapon, the Noisy Crickett and him trying to deliver a baby squid type creature. The aliens are smart, their inventive, and their just plain fun when seeing how they identify themselves and hide their identities. The story is funny and will keep you laughing at almost every scene.

The presentation of aliens as everyday people trying to live normal lives in Manhattan is a lot more fun than the presentation of murderous aliens (Independence Day). Another great part is that the film isn't overblown with special effects of alien explosions and massive battles. Instead comedy and chemistry keeps this top comedy flowing. 

Men In Black. Starring: Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Linda Fiorentino, and Rip Torn.

4 1/2 out of 5 Stars.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":543103,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"1997-07-02","keywords":"alien,pantyhose,superhero,flying saucer,laser gun","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1466737177","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTg1MDQ2MzU2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzQ0ODkyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTg1MDQ2MzU2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzQ0ODkyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A streetwise NYPD detective joins a secret organization that polices extraterrestrial affairs on Earth.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000169/","name":"Tommy Lee Jones","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000226/","name":"Will Smith","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000400/","name":"Linda Fiorentino"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001756/","name":"Barry Sonnenfeld"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108321/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0192384/","name":"Lowell Cunningham","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004412/","name":"Ed Solomon"],"duration":"PT1H38M"</script><metacontent="

Step Up 2
programme.desc:
Step Up 2: The Streets: Directed by Jon M. Chu. With Briana Evigan, Robert Hoffman, Adam Sevani, Cassie Ventura. Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1023481/","name":"Step Up 2: The Streets","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc0NzYxOTgxOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTgxMjc1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1023481/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"darkloveforever_101"},"dateCreated":"2008-02-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Moderately fun film","reviewBody":""Step Up 2 the streets" is a movie that is for a fun, "no-thinking" outing. The sequel to the popular "Step Up" was obviously not as good as the first (sequels and prequels never really are) but it was a fun film to watch.

There was a few good comedic scenes, and the street dancing really was incredible, especially at the end of the movie. This kind of movie is obviously going to be a little bit predictable and cheesy, but still- it's fun to see with some friends on a Saturday night.

Also, the soundtrack really helped improve the movie; there were many excellent, cool songs playing throughout the film, such as "The Way I are" by Timbaland and "Low" by Flo-rida ft. T-Pain.

If you give it a chance, you may enjoy it. It depends on whether or not you enjoy feel-good, funny dance movies. If not, then don't go see it! The final verdict: Step Up 2 is a moderately fun film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":86014,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Music","Romance"],"datePublished":"2008-06-04","keywords":"dance off,dancing in the rain,dance movie,dance audition,dance crew","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Step Up 2 the Streets","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1253179673","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MTAyOTYzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDMzNjAyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MTAyOTYzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDMzNjAyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Step Up 2 the Streets Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1382207/","name":"Robert Hoffman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0263759/","name":"Briana Evigan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0144260/","name":"Cassie Ventura"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0160840/","name":"Jon M. Sex i grad 2
programme.desc: Sex and the City 2: Directed by Michael Patrick King. With Sarah Jessica Parker, Kristin Davis, Cynthia Nixon, Kim Cattrall. While wrestling with the pressures of life, love, and work in Manhattan, Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte join Samantha for a trip to Abu Dhabi (United Arab Emirates), where Samantha's ex is filming a new movie." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1261945/","name":"Sex and the City 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3OTUyNTI3MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODcyMzM0Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"While wrestling with the pressures of life, love, and work in Manhattan, Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte join Samantha for a trip to Abu Dhabi (United Arab Emirates), where Samantha's ex is filming a new movie.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1261945/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chant320"},"dateCreated":"2010-05-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stinky and Ugly","reviewBody":"I AM female. I love to watch a good chic-flick. However, I was so disappointed. This movie has little to offer except constantly changing 'bizarre' costuming presented as high fashion and thoroughly embarrassing 'ugly American' scenes of over-indulged, entitled and rudely written characters. I went to the theater to enjoy a fun movie. I came away shaking my head. The movie was disrespectful to me as an American woman. Who acts like Samantha when in a foreign country, the Middle East or otherwise? As I watched the characters make total asses of themselves I was embarrassed for them simply sitting in the theater. It's no wonder other countries believe Americans lack respect for everyone and everything. Hollywood apparently does and wants everyone to know it. Unfortunately, the general public is judged by Hollywood--the American delivery system. It's not worth the money to see it. If you can get it on DVD for a buck, then judge for yourself.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":77625,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2010-06-02","keywords":"sexually empowered woman,promiscuous woman,sex comedy,kissing a married woman,sex in bed","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sex and the City -- Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi196609817","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzY4NjUzMzgyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDg5NTMyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzY4NjUzMzgyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDg5NTMyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Sex and the City -- Trailer #2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000572/","name":"Sarah Jessica Parker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000326/","name":"Kim Cattrall"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004862/","name":"Kristin Davis"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0455078/","name":"Michael Patrick King"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0455078/","name":"Michael Patrick King"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124299/","name":"Candace Bushnell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0823015/","name":"Darren Star"}],"duration":"PT2H26M"}</script><metacontent="

Professional assassin Chev Chelios learns his rival has injected him with a poison that will kill him if his heart rate drops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0479884/","name":"Crank","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjg0NjAxNDY4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODA5MjMzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Professional assassin Chev Chelios learns his rival has injected him with a poison that will kill him if his heart rate drops.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0479884/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"felakin"},"dateCreated":"2007-01-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"A must see, really intelligent action here.","reviewBody":"Did see Crank. And I loved it. Fun, crazy, unexpected, twisted, action, sad, happy and totally weird. The story is so tight and adrenalin packed that it is a unbelievable sight indeed. I did sit in my couch with eyes peeled every minute. Have to say that I really did not believe I would get such a nice movie for the evening. Compared to many other action movies this one really stick out from the rest.

And Jason Statham did a fantastic role in Crank. I loved him in The Transporter and The Transporter 2.

I highly recommend it. Though have in mind that it is some heavy action with some strong scenes in it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":243625,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2007-01-31","keywords":"outdoor sex,heart,poison,public nudity,cult film","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Crank","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3364028953","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2FlZTk5N2EtMTY5ZC00NTE5LWIwNmUtOTdhMWVjYTVhNGZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2FlZTk5N2EtMTY5ZC00NTE5LWIwNmUtOTdhMWVjYTVhNGZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man with an hour to live exacts revenge on his murderers in this trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005458/","name":"Jason Statham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005442/","name":"Amy Smart"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0764430/","name":"Carlos Sanz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004410/","name":"Mark Neveldine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0962729/","name":"Brian Taylor"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005323/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060306/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029540/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004410/","name":"Mark Neveldine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0962729/","name":"Brian Taylor"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

Professional assassin Chev Chelios learns his rival has injected him with a poison that will kill him if his heart rate drops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0479884/","name":"Crank","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjg0NjAxNDY4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODA5MjMzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Professional assassin Chev Chelios learns his rival has injected him with a poison that will kill him if his heart rate drops.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0479884/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"felakin","dateCreated":"2007-01-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"A must see, really intelligent action here.","reviewBody":"Did see Crank. And I loved it. Fun, crazy, unexpected, twisted, action, sad, happy and totally weird. The story is so tight and adrenalin packed that it is a unbelievable sight indeed. I did sit in my couch with eyes peeled every minute. Have to say that I really did not believe I would get such a nice movie for the evening. Compared to many other action movies this one really stick out from the rest.

credits.actor: Jet Li, Jason Statham, Andrea Roth, Luis Guzmán, Ryo Ishibashi, John Lone, Devon Aoki, Saul Rubinek

programme.title: Vrasje me Pagesë
programme.desc: J.Piven, B.Affleck, A.Garcia, R.Liotta. Kur Buddy 'Aces' Israel, keqbërësi i vogël, i lidhur me gangsterin Primo Sparazza, vendos të bashkëpunojë me drejtësinë, ky i fundit vë nje shpërblim prej 1 milion dollarësh për kokën e tij.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Qyteti i policëve
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone, Harvey Keitel, Robert De Niro. Në një qytet në dukje të qetë, të populluar nga policët, një sherif përballet me një komplot në radhët e tyre dhe duhet të zgjedhë mes zbatimit të ligjit dhe mbrojtjes së idhujve të tij.
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Lufta e Engjëjve
programme.desc: Një vajzë e re, mbyllet ne një spital psikiatrik nga njerku i saj abuzues, i cili ka rregulluar që asaj t'i kryhet një procedurë e tmerrshme. Për të përballuar të ardhmen, ajo krijon një botë imagjinare, ku planifikon arratisjen...
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Pertej horizontit
programme.desc: Pasi një pjesë e popullsisë së Los Anxhelosit rrëmbehet nga alienet, një dektektiv sulmon anijen kozmike për të shpëtuar të birin. Kur mjetit alien rrëzohet, ai bën aleancë me të mbijetuarit për të zbuluar çelësin e shpëtimit të planetit.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
Aksion

programme.title: Arratisje nga grataçela
programme.desc: C. Forlani. Një rrjedhje gazi shkakton një shpërthim të fuqishëm në një nga qiellgërvishtësit më të sigurtë. Dy prindër në prag të divorcit detyrohen të bashkëpunojnë për të shpëtuar fëmijët e tyre, të bllokuar nga flakët në katin e 20-të.
programme.category: Aksion
dramë

programme.title: Set up
programme.desc: 50 Cent, Bruce Willis, Ryan Phillippe. Sqarimi i hesapeve mes dy miqëve të ngushtë, anëtarë të një bande, ndërlikohet kur njëri prej tyre përfshin në lojë një bos të pamëshirshëm.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Ben-Hur
programme.desc: Jack Huston, Morgan Freeman. Judë Ben-Hur, një princ i akuzuar padrejtësisht për tradhti nga vëllai i tij i birësuar, rikthehet në vendlindje pas shumë vitesh skllavërie për të kërkuar hakmarrjen, por gjen paqen shpirtërore...
programme.category: Aksion
dramë historike

programme.title: Mbledhësi i borxheve
programme.desc: Scott Adkins, Louis Mandylor. Një instruktor i arteve marciale në vështirësi pranon të punojë si mbledhës borxhesh për një organizatë kriminale. Puna duket mjaft e lehtë, derisa një "klient" e përfshin në një situatë të paparashikuar...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Sulm në rajonin 33
programme.desc: Sean Patrick Flanery. Një veteran i dekoruar që vuan nga stresi post traumatik bëhet dëshmitar i pengmarrjes së një spitali lokal nga terroristë të mirëorganizuar. Vajza, bashkëshortja e tij dhe një gjeneral janë brenda në godinë dhe ai është shpresa e ty.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Borëbardha dhe Gjahtari
programme.desc: Charlize Theron, Kristen Stewart. Nje version vizionar, aksion-aventurë të historisë legjendare të Borëbardhës... Mbretëresha e ligë, do të jetojë përgjithmonë e bukur, nëse arrin të eliminojë Borëbardhën...
programme.category: Aventurë
aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Pararoja
programme.desc: Jackie Chan. Agjencia elitare e sigurisë, "Vanguard" është e vetmja shpresë mbijetese për një kontabilist që ndiqet nga kriminelët më të rrezikshëm në botë. Për të mbrojtur klientin e tij, kreu i agjencisë detyrohet të marrë pjesë personalisht në një aksi.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë

programme.title: Rojtarët e Galaktikës
programme.desc: Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana etj. Një njeri i lindur në Tokë, por i rritur në hapësirë, bashkon forcat me disa jashtëtokësorë, per të siguruar një sferë magjike dhe për t'u përballur me një forcë të së keqes që kërcënon gjithë universin.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë
fantashkencë

programme.title: Parker
programme.desc: Jason Statham, Jennifer Lopez. Parker, nje hajdut me një kod të caktuar profesional, tradhtohet nga ortakët e tij dhe lihet pas me mendimin se u eliminua. Nën një maskim të ri, ai fillon misionin për të marrë shpagimin që i takon...

programme.title: Protokolli i mbijetesës
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich, Pierce Brosnan. Pasi akuzohet padrejtësisht për një sulm terrorist, nje punonjëse e ambasadës Amerikane, merr arratinë dhe ndërkohë që u shmanget vrasësve përpiqet edhe të ndalë një plan shumë më vdekjeprurës.

programme.title: Objektivi
programme.desc: Sean Penn, Javier Bardem. 8 vite pasi arrin të eliminojë ministrin e minierave në Kongo, ish vrasësi profesionist Terrier rikthehet dhe nis një jetë të re. Por kur ish shefat e tij duan ta eliminojnë, ai bën pamundurën për të mbijetuar...

programme.title: Expo
programme.desc: Ndërsa ka vetëm tre ditë kohë për të vërtetuar pafajësinë e tij, një ish ushtar detyrohet të zbulojë rrëmbyesin e një adoleshenteje, në të kundërt do të dënohet për një krim që ai nuk e ka kryer.

programme.title: Hana
programme.desc: Saoirse Ronan, Eric Bana, Cate Blanchett. Një adoleshente e stërvitur nga babai për të qenë një vrasëse e përsosur, zbulon një sekret të së kaluarës që mund të vendosë gjithçka në dilemë, madje edhe ekzistencën e saj.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: B.Willis, B.Affleck, L.Tyler, B.B.Thornton. Kandidat për 4 çmime Oskar. Një skuadër speciale e Nasa-s niset në hapësirë për të shpëtuar Tokën nga asteroidi gjigant që për 18 ditë rrezikon t'i japë fund ekzistencës së saj.

programme.title: Njerëzit-X: Apokalipsi
programme.desc: 2016. James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender. Pasi mutanti i parë në histori, shkatërruesi Apokalips rishfaqet pas mijëra vitesh, Njerëzit-X duhet të bashkojnë forcat për t'i bërë ballë planit të tij për shfarosjen e njerëzimit.

programme.title: Djemtë e këqij
programme.desc: Martin Lawrence, Will Smith. Dy policë duhet të mbrojnë dëshmitaren e një vrasjeje, ndërkohë që kanë vetëm 72 orë kohë për të gjetur sasinë e konsiderueshme të heroinës që u vodh në stacionin e policisë mu nën hundën e tyre.

programme.title: Mbledhësit e borxheve 2
programme.desc: Scott Adkins, Louis Mandylor. Dyshja e mbledhësve të borxheve duhet të marrin paratë e vjedhura të shefit të tyre dhe të luftojnë me një bos droge hakmarrës, ndërsa përballen me rreziqe të papritura që u vijnë nga të gjitha anët.

programme.title: Xhek Riçer
programme.desc: Tom Cruise. Kur 5 njerëz të pafajshëm vriten nga një snajper, provat të çojnë tek nje i dyshuar, i arrestuar nga policia. Por gjatë pyetësorit, i dyshuari jep vetëm një përgjigje: 'Sillni Xhek Riçer'... Kush është në të vërtetë vrasësi?

programme.title: Gjahtari: Lufta e Dimrit
programme.desc: 2016. Ndërkohë që lufta midis dy motrave mbretëresha Ravena dhe Freja arrin kulmin, gjahtari Erik dhe luftëtarja Sara, të rritur për të qenë mbrojtës të Frejës, bëjnë të pamundurën të fshehin dashurinë e tyre, ndërkohë që luftojnë të keqen.

programme.title: Titanët e Paqësorit 2:Rebelimi
programme.desc: 2018. Me John Boyega. Piloti rebel Xheik Pentekost do të bashkojë forcat me hakeren 15-vjeçare dhe me ish-kolegun e tij, kundër një kërcënimi të ri alien. Ata do ta çojnë në një shkallë tjetër këte aventurë spektakolare.

programme.title: Misioni:Budapest
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich. Pasi përfshihet aksidentalisht në një traifk armësh, një adhurues i sporteve ekstreme rekrutohet nga një agjente elitare dhe misterioze në një mision të rrezikshëm, nga i cili varet fati i botës.

programme.title: Njeriu-Milingonë
programme.desc: Paul Rudd, Michael Douglas. I pajisur me një kostum që e zvogëlon sa nje115 milingonë por i jep fuqi të jashtëzakonshme, një grabitës profesionist duhet të ndihmojë mësuesin e tij për të kryer një vjedhje që do të shpëtojë botën.

programme.desc: Robert DeNiro, Oakes Fegley, Uma Thurman. Piteri dhe gjyshi i tij, Edi, dikur ishin shumë të afërt, por kur gjyshi vjen të jetojë me familjen, Piteri është i detyruar të heqë dorë nga pasuria e tij më e çmuar: dhoma e tij e gjumit.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Skuadra Vetëvrasëse

programme.category: Aksion/Aventurë/Fantazi

programme.title: Everesti, jeti i vogël
programme.desc: Kur adoleshentja Yi zbulon një Jeti të ri në çatinë e banesës së saj në Shanghai, ajo dhe dy miqtë e saj trazovaçë nisin një aventurë emocionuese për të bashkuar krijesën magjike me familjen e tij, në pikën më të lartë të Tokës.
programme.category: Vizatimor
aventurë

programme.title: Projekti Sypërgjakuri
programme.desc: Vin Diesel. Një marins i vrarë në detyre, rikthehet në jetë me superfuqi nga një organizatë që kërkon ta përdorë atë si armë.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Të gjesh burrin e përkryer
programme.desc: Ivan Sergei, Jennifer Love Hewitt. Në përpjekje për t'i fituar zemrën një vajze hebreje, një i ri kërkon ndihmën e mikut të tij për t'i mësuar si të shtiret si një njeri i komunitetit.

programme.title: Mr. Bean dhe fëmija
programme.desc: Rowan Atkinson, në rolin e tij më të pëlqyer nga publiku. Jeta për Mr. Bean, është një sfidë dhe kudo ku ai shkon gjithçka kthehet përmbys. E megjithë këto, falë këmbënguljes së tij, ai gjithmonë gjen një zgjidhje...

programme.title: Ankthi i madh
programme.desc: Parodi nga Mel Brooks të filmave suspansë 'Vertigo' dhe 'Zogjtë' të Alfred Hitchcock.

programme.title: Film pa zë
programme.desc: Mel Brooks. Parodi e filmave pa zë. Një regjisor, karriera e të cilit ka perënduar, kërkon të realizojë një film pa zë edhe pse ka mbi 40 vjet që nuk prodhohen më.

programme.title: Banzai
programme.desc: Paolo Villaggio, në rolin e një shitësi siguracionesh, i cili urdhërohet nga shefi i tij që të shkojë në Kanada. Por ashtu fare rastësisht, ai ngatërron avionë dhe e gjen veten në Lindjen e largët, ku e presin shumë të papritura...

programme.title: Profesori i marrosur 2
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy. Profesori i marrosur është rikthyer! Kësaj radhe ka zbuluar formulën brilante për të qëndruar 'gjithmonë i ri' dhe ka tërhequr me vete gjithë familjen në aventurat e tij më të reja.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: A.Sandler. Happy Gilmore, një lojtar hokej, merr pjesë në turneun e golfit me shpresë se do të fitojë paratë e mjaftueshme për të shpëtuar shtëpinë e gjyshes. Problemi është se mentaliteti i tij si lojtar hokej s'ka lidhje me botën e golfit.

programme.title: Vafsh në djall, Gëte
programme.desc: Elyas M'Barek, Karoline Herfurth. Një ish i burgosur punësohet në një shkollë ku janë fshehur paratë nga grabitja e tij e fundit.

programme.title: Heroi i qendrës tregtare
programme.desc: Kevin James. Një njeri i qetë dhe mbipeshë, punon si roje në një qendër tregtare, sepse gjithmonë dështon në përpjekjet e tij për t'u bërë polic. Por kur qendra sulmohet nga një grup grabitësish, ai është i vetmi që mund t'i ndalë...

programme.title: Soap opera
programme.desc: Me Fabio De Luigi, Cristiana Capotondi, Ricky Memphis, Chiara Francini. Disa histori dashurie, te ndërthurura me njëra - tjetrën, nën atmosferën e festave, të fund vitit. Një komedi mbi jetën, e cila ndonjëherë është si një Telefilm...

programme.title: Forca e muzikës
programme.desc: Kur një muzikant roku në moshë, humbet lidhjen me realitetin dhe fillon të prodhojë albume "unike.

programme.title: Rroftë Franca
programme.desc: JosØ Garcia, Michaël Youn. Për të tërhequr vëmendjen e botës drejt Tabulistanit, një vendi të panjohur aziatik, djali i presidentit të vendit dërgon dy barinj zemërmirë, Muzafarin dhe Feruzin, të shkatërrojnë kullën Eiffel në Paris.

programme.title: Vit i brishtë
programme.desc: 2010. Amy Adams, Matthew Goode, Adam Scott. Duke besuar në traditën irlandeze se nëse propozon për martesë më 29 Shkurt, duhet të thuhet Po, një vajzë e re ndërmerr një udhëtim të paparashikueshëm për t'i propozuar të dashurit.

programme.title: Krishtlindje me babagjyshin
programme.desc: Katër motra krejt të ndryshme nga njëra-tjetra, mblidhen në rezidencën luksoze të familjes për të festuar krishtlindjet e përkryera. Por grindjet, keqkuptimet komike dhe rishfaqja e babait që i braktisi në vogëli, çojnë në zbulimin e sekretit që ndau familjen vite më parë.

programme.title: Shtëpia paranormale 2
programme.desc: Parodi e filmave: Aktivitet paranormal 4, Nata e djallit, Ligësi, Djalli në kuti, Ekzorcizmi i fundit 2, Dosjet Uorren.

programme.title: Në periferi
programme.desc: Një djalë i ri detyrohet të kujdeset për motrat e tij të vogla pasi e ëma burgoset për vrasjen e babait të tyre abuzues. Por kur ai nis një lidhje me një grua të martuar, sekrete familjare të fshehura prej kohësh, fillojnë të dalin në sipërfaqe...
programme.category: Thriller
dramë

programme.title: Shtëpia horror
programme.desc: Maria Bello. Kur disa gjahtarë fantazmash amatorë hyjnë në një shtëpi të braktisur, kërkimi i tyre kthehet në një masakër të frikshme. Të gjitha pikëpyetjeve të ngjarjes duhet t'i japin përgjigje një detektiv dhe një psikolog.
programme.category: Horror
thriller

programme.title: Hallouin
programme.desc: Nga Rob Zombie, vjen një ripërpunim i një prej filmave horror më të suksesshëm. Vite pas krimeve monstruoze, vrasësi famëkeq Majkëll Majërs, rikthehet në qytezën e tij në kërkim të së motrës dhe kushdo që i del përpara e pret i njëjti fat...
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Të dyshuarit e përhershem
programme.desc: Fitues i dy trofeve Oskar. S.Baldwin, G.Byrne, K.Spacey. Pesë kriminelë rrethohen nga policia në mënyrë të pazakontë që i vë në alarm. Pasi lirohen, hartojnë planin e hakmarrjes, por dikush tjetër i ka gjërat nën kontroll.
programme.category: Thriller
mister

programme.title: Private
programme.desc: Pasi pranohet në një kolegj privat tepër të vlerësuar, Reed fillon të shijojë privilegjet dhe jetën e festave të akademisë "Easton". Por asgjë nuk është siç duket në kolegjin e famshëm, as historia e saj e re e dashurisë.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Twilight
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson. Bela, një vajzë e re adoleshente rrezikon gjithçka kur bie në dashuri me një vampir. Takimi me Eduardin, i bukur dhe inteligjent, do të shndërrohet shpejt në një histori dashurie plot pasion.
programme.category: Fantazi
romancë

programme.title: Kujdes kë ke pranë
programme.desc: 2016. Olivia DeJonge, Patrick Warburton. Pasi shtëpia e tyre sulmohet, një dado duhet të mbrojë një 12 vjeçar, por shumë shpejt zbulon një të vërtetë tronditëse mbi djaloshin.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Rrezja e vdekjes
programme.desc: Një burrë zgjohet pas një aksidenti misterioz për të mësuar një realitet të ri tmerrues: çdokush që i afrohet në rrezen e 15 metrave, vdes menjëherë.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
thriller

programme.title: Dorëzimi
programme.desc: 2014. Tom Hardy, Noomi Rapace, James Gandolfini! Bob dhe Marv, drejtojnë nje bar që përdoret si vend 'dorëzimi', ku shuma parash lihen aty për bandat e lagjes. Por kur bien pre e një grabitjeje, të dy do të gjenden përballë zgjedhjeve të rrezikshme m.
programme.category: Krim
dramë

programme.title: Ekipi Foxcatcher
programme.desc: Steve Carell, Channing Tatum, Mark Ruffalo. Film kandidat për 5 çmime Oskar. Bazuar në ngjarje të vërteta, kjo është historia mahnitëse dhe tragjike mes një milioneri dhe dy vëllezërve kampionë në mundje...
programme.category: Sport
Krim

programme.title: Një plan i rrezikshëm
programme.desc: S.Worthington. Në katin e fundit të një hoteli, një ish polic, i arratisur nga burgu këmbëngul në pafajsinë e tij dhe kërcënon se do të hidhet. Ndërkohë që një negociatore përpiqet ta ndalojë, një plan i rrezikshëm është vënë në lëvizje.
programme.category: Krim

programme.title: Ish Makina
programme.desc: 2014. Domhnall Gleeson, Alicia Vikander, Oscar Isaac. Një programues i ri përzgjidhet për të vlerësuar aftësitë e një roboteje bukuroshe që mendon dhe ndien si një njeri...
programme.category: Fantashkencë
thriller

programme.title: 47 metra nën det
programme.desc: 2017. Mandy Moore, Claire Holt. Dy motra me pushime në Meksikë, bllokohen në një kafaz hekuri 47 metra nën det. Me vetëm 1 orë oksigjen dhe me peshkaqenë të shumtë që sillen rrotull, ato duhet të gjejnë sa më shpejt një mënyrë për të mbijetuar.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Para se të fle
programme.desc: 2014. N.Kidman, C.Firth. Pas një aksidenti të rëndë që e bën të humbasë kujtesën, një grua zgjohet çdo mëngjes pa mbajtur mend asgjë. Por papritur, të vërteta të frikshme fillojnë t'i shfaqen në vegime dhe e bëjnë të dyshojë për gjithçka...
programme.category: Mister
thriller

programme.title: Fajtorë të pafajshëm
programme.desc: 2011. Matthew McConaughey, Ryan Phillippe, Marisa Tomei. Një avokat të suksesshëm që shumicën e punës e bën nga makina e tij, e kap kriza e ndërgjegjjes kur përfaqëson një klient të pasur që ka planin ideal për të mashtruar sistemin.
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Gracka e akullt
programme.desc: Një ditë tipike për tre miq, që do të shkonin për ski, kthehet në makth kur ata marrin teleferikun për të bërë xhiron e fundit. Punonjësit largohen, gjithçka ndalet dhe ata kuptojnë se kanë mbetur të bllokuar pa asnjë rrugëdalje...
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Krijesa e Atlantidës
programme.desc: Bazuar në romanin Albert Sánchez Piñol. Në vitin 1914, një i ri pranon të shkojë në një ishull pranë Antarktikut për të vëzhguar kushtet e motit, por shumë shpejt do të zbulojë se ishulli është i populluar nga krijesa jo miqësore me të.
programme.category: Horror
fantashkencë

programme.title: Origjina e syrit
programme.desc: 2014. Michael Pitt. Një shkencëtar që studion evolucionin e syrit, bie në dashuri me sytë e vajzës që po eksperimenton... Vite më vonë, bashkë me partneren e tij të laboratorit, ai bën një zbulim që do të ndryshojë besimin e tij si në shkencë.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
dramë

programme.title: Akullthyesi
programme.desc: Të mbijetuarit e epokës së dytë të akullnajave në Tokë, jetojnë brenda një treni luksoz që çan përmes akullit e borës. Në kërkim të kushteve më të mira, udhëtarët më të varfër, ngrihen në revoltë kundër të privilegjuarve.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Britma e urrejtjes
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins, Alec Baldwin. Ata të dy u grindën për hir të një femre kur aeroplani u rrëzua. Tani, të vetëm në pyll, të pambrojtur, mundësia e vetme për mbijetesë është të mbështeten tek njëri tjetri.
programme.category: Thriller
aventurë

programme.title: Samaritani i mirë
programme.desc: 2014.Me Dominic Cooper, Samuel L. Jackson. Pasi përfshihet në një aksident fatal, një prokuror duhet të ndjekë penalisht një njeri të pafajshëm të akuzuar për aksidentin që ai vetë shkaktoi...
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Rrëmbimi i avionit
programme.desc: Joseph Gordon-Levitt. Pasi avioni i linjës Berlin - Paris merret peng në fluturim, piloti dytësor, që dëshmon ngjarjen nga kabina e sigurtë e pilotimit, duhet të zgjedhë mes jetëve të ekuipazhit apo shmangies së një katastrofë me të madhe.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Vrasje gjakftohtë
programme.desc: 2019. Jean Reno. Një vrasës legjender tërhiqet në qetësinë e një shtëpie të izoluar buzë liqenit. Takimi rastësor me një grua dhe sekreti që ajo fsheh, mund ta detyrojnë atë t'u rikthehet mënyrave të tij vdekjeprurëse.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Fraktura
programme.desc: Rei dhe gruaja e tij nxitojnë të çojnë vajzën e tyre në urgjencë pas një aksidenti. Gjatë vizitave, ai humbet kontaktet me familjen, por spitali nuk ka asnjë të dhënë që gruaja dhe vajza e tij të kenë qënë ndonjëherë aty...
programme.category: Thriller psikologjik

programme.title: Në terr
programme.desc: Maria Bello, Sean Bean. Një grua përjeton tmerrin më të madh të jetës se saj... e bija mbytet. E torturuar nga kujtimet e saj, ajo mëson për Tokën e të vdekurve prej nga ku vjen një legjendë shpresedhenese.
programme.category: Horror
mister

programme.title: Hajdutët Ndërkombëtarë
programme.desc: Me Dwayne Johnson, Ryan Reynolds, Gal Gadot. Agjenti special i FBI-së John Hartley është në ndjekje të hajdutes më të kërkuar të artit në botë, e cila është gjithmonë një hap para tij. Për t'ja dalë mbanë, ai duhet të bashkëpunojë me hajdutin nr 2 të artit në botë..

programme.title: Venom 2: Furia e Masakrës
programme.desc: Me Tom Hardy, Woody Harrelson, Michelle Williams. Bashkëjetesa midis Eddie Brock dhe alienit Venom, vazhdon të jetë e konfliktuale. Por kur vrasësi i rrezikshëm serial Cletus Kasady, arratiset nga burgu, Brock dhe Venom duhet të lënë mënjanë mosmarrëveshjet e tyre, për të ndaluar mbretërimin e terrorit të tij...

programme.title: Agjenti 007: S'ka kohë për të vdekur
programme.desc: Misioni për të shpëtuar një shkencëtar të rrëmbyer, rezulton të jetë një kurth i pabesë për James Bond-in (Daniel Craig), duke e çuar atë në gjurmët e një krimineli misterioz (Rami Malek), të armatosur me teknologji të re dhe shumë të rrezikshme.

programme.title: Fajtori
programme.desc: Detektivi i policisë Joe Baylor (Jake Gyllenhaal), i caktuar përkohësisht në detyrën e operatorit në qëndrën e ndihmës së shpejtë, përpiqet të shpëtojë jetën e Emily (Riley Keough), një telefonuese e alarmuar që thotë se është rrëmbyer. Por, asgjë nuk është ashtu siç duket.

programme.title: Venom 2: Furia e Masakrës
programme.desc: Me Tom Hardy, Woody Harrelson, Michelle Williams. Bashkëjetesa midis Eddie Brock dhe alienit Venom, vazhdon të jetë e konfliktuale. Por kur vrasësi i rrezikshëm serial Cletus Kasady, arratiset nga burgu, Brock dhe Venom duhet të lënë mënjanë mosmarrëveshjet e tyre, për të ndaluar mbretërimin e terrorit të tij...

programme.title: Lepurushi Piter 2: Arratisja
programme.desc: Thomas dhe Bea tani janë të martuar dhe jetojnë me Piterin dhe familjen e tij të lepurushave. I mërzitur nga jeta në kopsht, Piteri shkon në qytetin e madh, ku takon personazhe misteriozë dhe përfundon duke i hapur telashe të gjithë familjes.
