programme.title: The General's Daughter
Generalova kći
programme.desc:
The General's Daughter: Directed by Simon West. With John Travolta, Madeleine Stowe, James Cromwell, Timothy Hutton. When the daughter of a well-known and well-respected base commander is murdered, an undercover detective is summoned to look into the matter and finds a slew of cover-ups at West Point." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0144214/","name":"The General's Daughter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzY3NDQ2YzctMTY1MC00NzkwLWJmNzctMDgzZWI1OWY5MDhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"When the daughter of a well-known and well-respected base commander is murdered, an undercover detective is summoned to look into the matter and finds a slew of cover-ups at West Point.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0144214/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Hey_Sweden"},"dateCreated":"2015-02-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Slick and engrossing.","reviewBody":"John Travolta stars as Paul Brenner, a charismatic man in the Army's C.I.D. unit. Paul is called upon to solve the strange rape & murder of the title character, Elizabeth Campbell (Leslie Stefanson). Paul gets paired with a rape investigator named Sara Sunhill (Madeleine Stowe), who just happens to be a former flame of his. As Paul and Sara work the clues, they discover a string of characters who all have their secrets to hide. And it becomes apparent that the Army's main concern is keeping things quiet and maintaining the public image.

While far from a great story, this is still an absorbing one. There's a very tragic and somber arc that stems from the Elizabeth Campbell character being a *very* troubled individual. The story isn't always too believable, but director Simon West keeps the plot progressing in competent enough fashion, with a couple of twists along the way. The more serious and sordid elements are sometimes contrasted with not terribly amusing banter between Travolta and Stowe.

The exemplary supporting cast is the main reason to watch. Travolta lays on the goofy charm a bit much at first (and does a deliberately bad Southern accent for too long a time), but as the movie goes on, the better his performance gets. He and Stowe are able to create some chemistry. Stefanson is effective as the victim, and James Cromwell as her general father is completely convincing. Clarence Williams III also scores strongly as the generals' comrade, who's loyal to the core. The real standout is the always dynamic James Woods, as Elizabeths' mentor; the scenes where he and Travolta are attempting to outwit each other are just about the best in the movie.

Well shot (by Peter Menzies Jr.) and decently paced, "The General's Daughter" manages to be watchable for a little under two hours.

Seven out of 10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":57618,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"1999-10-06","keywords":"army,cover up,murder,rape,military","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The General's Daughter","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1508549657","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDZhZDJiODEtNDBjNC00NTUxLWE1ZWMtMGQ3N2IxYzkzZjBmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDZhZDJiODEtNDBjNC00NTUxLWE1ZWMtMGQ3N2IxYzkzZjBmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The General's Daughter"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000237/","name":"John Travolta"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000656/","name":"Madeleine Stowe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000342/","name":"James Cromwell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0922346/","name":"Simon West"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075914/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067370/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0218491/","name":"Nelson DeMille"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0078203/","name":"Christopher Bertolini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001279/","name":"William Goldman"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Red Corner
Crveni ugao
programme.desc:
Red Corner: Directed by Jon Avnet. With Richard Gere, Bai Ling, Bradley Whitford, Byron Mann. An American attorney on business in China is wrongfully arrested and put on trial for murder, with a female defense lawyer from the country the only key to proving his innocence." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119994/","name":"Red Corner","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzE0MjU5NzQxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzQzNzU2NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An American attorney on business in China is wrongfully arrested and put on trial for murder, with a female defense lawyer from the country the only key to proving his innocence.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119994/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"trpdean"},"dateCreated":"2004-07-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very good, exciting, exotic suspense thriller","reviewBody":"I thought this was wonderful - and can't for the life of me understand the criticisms. 

Some seem to be attacking the movie on the basis that it is too hard on China - REALLY? 

Ask any North Korean refugee who's been captured in China -

 Ask any member of the harmless Falun Gong religious sect -

Ask anyone connected by family ties with those identified as having participated in the Tianenmen Square protests (the protests were actually in quite a number of cities - but television covered just the tens of thousands assembled in Beijing). 

No, it's not an "art house" kind of movie - don't expect the slow pace and strange story of something like Farewell My Concubine.

 Instead, it's a wonderful Hitchcock-type story transplanted to Communist China - and voila - a wonderful movie that should have been remembered at Oscar time! 

It's far better than, say, Hitchcock's Torn Curtain or Topaz - both set in repressive Communist regimes. It's more like a combination of The Wrong Man and North by Northwest - but sexier than either.

Our Welsh friend from beautiful Aberystwyth, Philip Davies, has it about right in his review printed beneath mine.

This is beautifully shot, with wonderful acting in a riveting Hitchcock type movie. Richard Gere is excellent - the politics and scenes of a changing China are fascinating.

I strongly recommend this one. 

This is very exciting, suspenseful, romantic - and its depiction of China rings true."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16998,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1997-10-31","keywords":"topless female nudity,female full rear nudity,assassination attempt,color in title,searching for the truth","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Red Corner","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3131311385","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWY1NzViMjQtMTM1MS00Y2Q3LWE5ZjQtOTVjYWI3NzBmYWVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWY1NzViMjQtMTM1MS00Y2Q3LWE5ZjQtOTVjYWI3NzBmYWVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from MGM"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000152/","name":"Richard Gere"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000499/","name":"Bai Ling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0925966/","name":"Bradley Whitford"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000816/","name":"Jon Avnet"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0006702/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0455207/","name":"Robert King"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: --- Actors: Richard Gere (role=Jack Moore), Bai Ling (role=Shen Yuelin), Bradley Whitford (role=Bob Ghery), Byron Mann (role=Lin Dan), Peter Donat (role=David McAndrews), Robert Stanton (role=Ed Pratt), Tsai Chin (role=Chairman Xu), James Hong (role=Lin Shou), Tzi Ma (role=Li Cheng), Ulrich Matschoss (role=Gerhardt Hoffman), Richard Venture (role=Ambassador Reed), Jessey Meng (role=Hong Ling)

IMDb data; ttnr: 0119994, Title: Red Corner, --- Description: Red Corner: Directed by Jon Avnet. With Richard Gere, Bai Ling, Bradley Whitford, Byron Mann. An American attorney on business in China is wrongfully arrested and put on trial for murder, with a female defense lawyer from the country the only key to proving his innocence." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119994/","name":"Red Corner","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzE0MjU5NzQxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzQzNzU2NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An American attorney on business in China is wrongfully arrested and put on trial for murder, with a female defense lawyer from the country the only key to proving his innocence.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119994/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"trpdean","dateCreated":"2004-07-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very good, exciting, exotic suspense thriller","reviewBody":"I thought this was wonderful - and can't for the life of me understand the criticisms. 

Some seem to be attacking the movie on the basis that it is too hard on China - REALLY? 

Ask any North Korean refugee who's been captured in China -

 Ask any member of the harmless Falun Gong religious sect -

Ask anyone connected by family ties with those identified as having participated in the Tianenmen Square protests (the protests were actually in quite a number of cities - but television covered just the tens of thousands assembled in Beijing). 

No, it's not an "art house" kind of movie - don't expect the slow pace and strange story of something like Farewell My Concubine.

 Instead, it's a wonderful Hitchcock-type story transplanted to Communist China - and voila - a wonderful movie that should have been remembered at Oscar time! 

It's far better than, say, Hitchcock's Torn Curtain or Topaz - both set in repressive Communist regimes. It's more like a combination of The Wrong Man and North by Northwest - but sexier than either.

Our Welsh friend from beautiful Aberystwyth, Philip Davies, has it about right in his review printed beneath mine.

This is beautifully shot, with wonderful acting in a riveting Hitchcock type movie. Richard Gere is excellent - the politics and scenes of a changing China are fascinating.

I strongly recommend this one. 

This is very exciting, suspenseful, romantic - and its depiction of China rings true.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16998,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1997-10-31","keywords":"topless female nudity,female full rear nudity,assassination attempt,color in title,searching for the truth","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Red Corner","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3131311385","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWY1NzViMjQtMTM1MS00Y2Q3LWE5ZjQtOTVjYWI3NzBmYWVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWY1NzViMjQtMTM1MS00Y2Q3LWE5ZjQtOTVjYWI3NzBmYWVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from MGM","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000152/","name":"Richard Gere","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000499/","name":"Bai Ling","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0925966/","name":"Bradley Whitford"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000816/","name":"Jon Avnet"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0006702/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0455207/","name":"Robert King"],"duration":"PT2H2M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dark Tide
Mračna plima
programme.desc: Dark Tide: Directed by John Stockwell. With Halle Berry, Olivier Martinez, Sizwe Msutu, Mark Elderkin. A professional diver tutor returns to deep waters after 1 year, following an almost fatal encounter with a great white shark. The nightmare from the deep is still lurking - more carnivorous and hungry than ever." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1507563/","name":"Dark Tide","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4NTUxOTc3NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDkwOTgzNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A professional diver tutor returns to deep waters after 1 year, following an almost fatal encounter with a great white shark. The nightmare from the deep is still lurking - more carnivorous and hungry than ever.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1507563/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CinemaSerf"},"dateCreated":"2020-06-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Leaves you with a certain sinking feeling...","reviewBody":"This isn't as dreadful as I had feared - it is actually, partially, redeemed by some really excellent underwater photography - and a suitably satisfactory denouement. Halle Berry is a diver whose on/off boyfriend Olivier Martinez manages to coax her into taking an arrogant, wealthy, Brit and his son on a cruise to swim with sharks. The story is poor, predictable and very slow to develop. Far too much of the jeopardy is created not from the sharks but from the rather odious millionaire Brit; his son and the two leads' rather tiresome are they/aren't they relationship - and, it appears that Berry has some history with sharks that resulted in her having had a near death experience. The dive footage of the sharks would have made for an interesting documentary on apex predators; the story ought just to have been shredded at birth...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8775,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-04-12","keywords":"shark,jelly fish,touching a shark,can of beer,spear gun","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Exclusive Premiere","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2116264217","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2ODQ2NDgwNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzA5ODgzNw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2ODQ2NDgwNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzA5ODgzNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the exclusive trailer premiere for the new thriller starring Halle Berry and Olivier Martinez, available via video on demand 3/8 and in theaters 3/30."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000932/","name":"Halle Berry"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0553648/","name":"Olivier Martinez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0114460/","name":"Ralph Brown"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007082/","name":"John Stockwell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0295380/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0291625/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0345025/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3602980/","name":"Amy Sorlie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0159892/","name":"Ronnie Christensen"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Blow
Beli prah
programme.desc:
Blow: Directed by Ted Demme. With Johnny Depp, Penélope Cruz, Franka Potente, Rachel Griffiths. The story of how George Jung, along with the Medellín Cartel headed by Pablo Escobar, established the American cocaine market in the 1970s in the United States." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0221027/","name":"Blow","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjg5ZDkzZWEtZDQ2ZC00Y2ViLThhMzYtMmIxZDYzYTY2Y2Y2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODAwMTU1MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of how George Jung, along with the Medellín Cartel headed by Pablo Escobar, established the American cocaine market in the 1970s in the United States.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0221027/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Quinoa1984"},"dateCreated":"2001-04-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cocaine, They Started that. Your Welcome.","reviewBody":"That statement was said by Denis Leary who, not surprisingly, co-produced this drug epic with Ted Demme who not only directs this film, but Leary's special No Cure for Cancer. Watching that special, I would've never expected a movie this good and serious, but it is. And unless a better film comes along this year, Blow might just be the best film of 2001.

In this bio-pic, George Jung is a guy who starts out by selling pot in the California area. After a while though, he progresses to selling cocaine in the late 70's and early 80's with the infamous Pablo Ecobar, and becomes a multi-millionaire (Jung, played by Jonny Depp very well, explains that if you bought cocaine in that time period in America, there would be a 85 percent chance it was from him). But then we see how things change with time, especially with Jung, which makes this movie even more fascinating and excellent.

While Blow is stylish, smart and hard edged with good stuff, the film also has compassion and feeling, in-particular in the third act which gives this movie a clever turn. Also with brilliant acting from the cast (the ensemble includes Depp, Paul Ruebens, Penelope Cruz and in a twist of a role from GoodFellas, Ray Liotta as Jung's dad) and a well told story, this is one of the best bio-pics and drug movies of the 00's.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":250534,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-04-06","keywords":"drug abuse,nosebleed,police officer,drug cartel,united states","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blow","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3504603417","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzUyMmUwMWQtYWFkZC00YTAxLWJiNjUtMTA0NzY0OTZlMGFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzUyMmUwMWQtYWFkZC00YTAxLWJiNjUtMTA0NzY0OTZlMGFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from New Line Cinema"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000136/","name":"Johnny Depp"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004851/","name":"Penélope Cruz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004376/","name":"Franka Potente"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001130/","name":"Ted Demme"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0072799/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028247/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0692051/","name":"Bruce Porter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0571346/","name":"David McKenna"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001024/","name":"Nick Cassavetes"}],"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Running Scared
Panično bekstvo
programme.desc:
Running Scared: Directed by Wayne Kramer. With Paul Walker, Cameron Bright, Vera Farmiga, Chazz Palminteri. A low-ranking thug is entrusted by his crime boss to dispose of a gun that killed corrupt cops, but things get out of control when the gun ends up in wrong hands." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0404390/","name":"Running Scared","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTIwOTAzMDc4MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjY5MzIzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A low-ranking thug is entrusted by his crime boss to dispose of a gun that killed corrupt cops, but things get out of control when the gun ends up in wrong hands.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0404390/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"xenazues"},"dateCreated":"2016-11-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Forget Fast and the Furious just watch this!!!","reviewBody":"So I reading some reviews and seriously speaking a 7.4 overall is just too low. Now I understand that is pretty high on here. Cause some reason everybody wants to compare every movie to the godfather and gone with the wind. And i love the godfther but lets be real. This was made in 2006 and I'm not sure if you can find another action movie that kept you on the edge of your seat 10 years after it.

I can't think of any. And if I could the acting wouldn't be the same. One thing a lot of people forgot to mention in these reviews. You can watch this movie over and over. Heck I even forgot about the ending. And I've seen this like 5 times already. And where a lot of action movies lack is they drift off and its either not too much action or they play out for the audience at the time. This movie brought it. Notice the female character fits no such stereotypes. Thats a win right there. Her character alone was part of the movie and added so much to it. 

You can just in this movie and wonder what is going to happen. Who is going to get shot, if anybody will get busted. I was once again so impressed with the acting that even the kid who is the main character as well is great at acting. Seems like a natural. Even the ending was great. 

I must say I hear a lot of talk about fast and the furious. And Paul walker was great in those movies (may he rest in peace). But this movie never gets mentioned and I don't know why. The car as well was an attraction."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":99200,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-02-24","keywords":"white panties,panties,kissing while having sex,adult child friendship,fistfight","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Running Scared","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2642411801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzhkNjdkNjktM2JlZS00MTI1LWFiZmUtOTFlZTVkNGZiOTdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzhkNjdkNjktM2JlZS00MTI1LWFiZmUtOTFlZTVkNGZiOTdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from New Line Cinema"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0908094/","name":"Paul Walker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1080974/","name":"Cameron Bright"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001590/","name":"Chazz Palminteri"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0469694/","name":"Wayne Kramer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051264/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0122499/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0469694/","name":"Wayne Kramer"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

Now I understand that is pretty high on here. Cause some reason everybody wants to compare every movie to the godfather and gone with the wind. And i love the godfther but lets be real. This was made in 2006 and I'm not sure if you can find another action movie that kept you on the edge of your seat 10 years after it.

I can't think of any. And if I could the acting wouldn't be the same. One thing a lot of people forgot to mention in these reviews. You can watch this movie over and over. Heck I even forgot about the ending. And I've seen this like 5 times already. And where a lot of action movies lack is they drift off and its either not too much action or they play out for the audience at the time. This movie brought it. Notice the female character fits no such stereotypes. Thats a win right there. Her character alone was part of the movie and added so much to it. 

You can just in this movie and wonder what is going to happen. Who is going to get shot, if anybody will get busted. I was once again so impressed with the acting that even the kid who is the main character as well is great at acting. Seems like a natural. Even the ending was great. 

I must say I hear a lot of talk about fast and the furious. And Paul walker was great in those movies (may he rest in peace). But this movie never gets mentioned and I don't know why. The car as well was an attraction.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":99200,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-02-24","keywords":"white panties,panties,kissing while having sex,adult child friendship,fistfight","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Running Scared","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2642411801","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzhkNjdkNjktM2JlZS00MTI1LWFiZmUtOTFlZTVkNGZiOTdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzhkNjdkNjktM2JlZS00MTI1LWFiZmUtOTFlZTVkNGZiOTdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from New Line Cinema","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0908094/","name":"Paul Walker","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1080974/","name":"Cameron Bright","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001590/","name":"Chazz Palminteri"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0469694/","name":"Wayne Kramer"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051264/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0122499/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0469694/","name":"Wayne Kramer"],"duration":"PT2H2M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Out of Death
Out Of Death
programme.desc:
Out of Death: Directed by Mike Burns. With Jaime King, Bruce Willis, Lala Kent, Kelly Greyson. A corrupt Sheriff's department in a rural mountain town comes undone when an unintended witness throws a wrench into their shady operation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12528166/","name":"Out of Death","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWQwNGUzYzUtOGM5Yy00ZTAwLTg4OWMtODhlMThlZTJmNDkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjE2MzI5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A corrupt Sheriff's department in a rural mountain town comes undone when an unintended witness throws a wrench into their shady operation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt12528166/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Top_Dawg_Critic"},"dateCreated":"2021-07-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Out of Death = Bored to Death.","reviewBody":"We've become accustomed in expecting a sub-par B-grade film when Bruce Willis (PLEASE retire!) is cast, but this one is by far one of the worst.

I get that director Mike Burns and writer Bill Lawrence are newb filmmakers, but this felt like a failed high school drama class production.

The dialogue was atrocious. Literally the entire first half of the film could've been cut down to 10 mins max. The scenes were too long, and/or unnecessary, and most were just plain ridiculous. There was a hefty lack of logic, with major plot and technical issues, and you'll find yourself either laughing or cringing at most scenes.

The pacing was horrible, and with the majority of the story being cheesy af, the normally comfortable 95 min runtime felt like 3+ hours. You'll be tempted to fast forward much of the film, and trust me, you wont miss much. Only the last 15 mins of the film felt like an adequate film production with good continuity in the scenes, and some decent drama and suspense, albeit predictable.

And what was Burns thinking with probably the worst cinematography I've seen in a long time? Were blue and earth-tones the only color filter palette choices? There's a scene when Willis arrives and greets his niece at the cabin, and all that stands out is her bright blue jeans in the entire scene. And the constant distant shots of the skyline, valleys and hills got very tiring fast.

The acting for the most part was bad and unconvincing - I'm sure in part due to Burns' inexperience in directing his cast, and Willis was his usual drab "I'm only here for the paycheck". Only Jaime King's performance was good and convincing throughout, and she basically carried the entire film.

The only decent component in this production was the score, which although still the typical B-film loud and overbearing score, it at least was somewhat fitting and wasn't playing through-out the entire 95 mins. But then again, this is Burns' main field of expertise in the film industry - music director, so had he messed that up, he'd have some 'splaining to do. The soundtrack was also fairly decent, although it played in many scenes that didn't really need loud country/rock music playing in the background.

It's a very generous 3/10 from me, mostly for King's performance, and also cutting the newb filmmakers some slack. Hopefully they learn from their mistakes.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3655,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2021-07-16","keywords":"low budget,hiking,urn of creamated ashes,rain,voice over journal","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Out of Death","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi538624025","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTczN2UwZTctOWU2NC00N2I0LTkxMDctYmVkYmM5ZmFkMmE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTczN2UwZTctOWU2NC00N2I0LTkxMDctYmVkYmM5ZmFkMmE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0454809/","name":"Jaime King"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000246/","name":"Bruce Willis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2742160/","name":"Lala Kent"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1230733/","name":"Mike Burns"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017712/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274103/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0474730/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11672642/","name":"Bill Lawrence"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Adijan Monk je brilijantni privatni detektiv, koji je nakon nervnog sloma posle smrti voljene supruge, otpušten iz policije. Kriminalistička, dramska serija prati slučajeve simpatičnog i sasvim neobičnog detektiva, Adrijana Monka. Monk pati od opsesivno-kompulsivnog poremećaja, od kad je doživeo stres posle smrti supruge. Iako je nakon nervnog sloma otpušten iz policije, njegovo fotografsko pamćenje i fantastična moć opažanja, omogućuju mu da reši slučajeve u kojima je policija nemoćna.

programme.title: Poldark
programme.desc: Britanska, istorijska, dramska serija donosi priču o Rosu Poldarku, koji se posle tri godine provedene u ratu vraća kući, gde više ništa nije kao što je bilo. Britanska, istorijska, dramska serija donosi priču o Rosu Poldarku, koji se posle tri godine provedene u ratu vraća kući, gde više ništa nije kao što je bilo.

programme.title: Mad Men
Momci s Madisona
programme.desc:
Mad Men: Created by Matthew Weiner. With Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser, January Jones. A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0804503/","name":"Mad Men","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTgxNDZlODQtNDcwOC00NWQ5LTljNWMtMDhjY2U5YTUzMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0804503/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Nooshin_Navidi"},"dateCreated":"2010-09-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Impeccable...","reviewBody":"This is a perfect show in every sense. The opening credits & animated intro are themselves works of art, and the creative direction makes the series so visually exquisite that you can't take your eyes off the screen even for a moment lest you miss one of the many perfect vignettes. The haunting opening music sets the stage for masterful sound design, ranging from each episode's musical selections to the subtlest of ambient sounds. The camera-work is nothing short of stunning; it loves each character and makes even the background action interesting. Talented cast and every character is watchable & believable.

For a period piece, 'Mad Men' is remarkably fresh. The show is set in 1960, following a decade of post-WWII recovery which, with the help of rampant consumerism, transformed America from an industrial society into a "leisure society". One of the most rewarding things about the show is how we get to witness the many cracks which had already begun to form in the manicured facade of the '50s, slowly making way for America's rebellion against the manufactured "good life", and resulting in the social & political upheaval of the 1960s and 1970s.

We get to have intimate glimpses into the various components of this process--money, power, politics, sex, race, gender roles-- in a way that makes us feel as if we're actually there in the room with the characters. The show also does a magnificent job of portraying the simultaneous liberation and objectification of women as consumerism rapidly transformed their role in society.

Each and every well-developed character on this show takes his/her turn to unfold in delicate layers. This unfolding is done with pin-point precision and subtlety, and without ever spoon-feeding us. And every new nugget of information is a highly relevant piece of this very addictive puzzle.

~NN","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":224350,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2007-07-19","keywords":"advertising,chain smoking,1960s,new york,drinking","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358316/","name":"Jon Hamm"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005253/","name":"Elisabeth Moss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440229/","name":"Vincent Kartheiser"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026995/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247554/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019701/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1980806/","name":"Matthew Weiner"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi69710105","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a trailer for AMC's "Mad Men.""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bruklin 9-9
programme.desc: Džejk Peralt, nezreli, ali talentovani detektiv iz Bruklina, dolazi u neposredni sukob sa svojim novim zapovednikom, ozbiljnim i strogim kapetanom Rejom Holtom. Tim detektiva iz 99. stanice u Bruklinu dobija novog kapetana Rejmonda Holta, veoma ozbiljnog i strogog komandantnog oficira, za razliku od ranijeg kapetana na koga su se svi u ovoj stanici navikli, i zato nastaje sukob detektiva Paralte i Rejmonda. Ejmi Santijago, vredna detektivka koja se uvek drži knjige, u početku ima kompetativni odnos sa Džejkom zbog brojnih uspeha sa obe strane, a kasnije njihova netrpljivost prerasta u romantičnu vezu. Takođe u ovoj stanici se nalaze detektiv Čarls Bojl, Džejkov najbolji drug, narednik Teri Džefords, veoma snažan i krupan ali osetljiv i porodičan čovek, Roza Dijaz, veoma agresivna i sposobna detektivka, asistentkinja Đina Lineti, veoma duhovit lik u seriji, i dva već starija detektiva koji su sada zaduženi za kancelarijski deo policijskog posla, Hičkok i Skali.

programme.title: Dobri doktor
programme.desc: Američka, medicinska drama u kojoj je glavni lik mladi hirurg Šon Marfi, autistični genije koji na stvari gleda drugačije od ostalih. "The Good Doctor" je američka, medicinska, dramska serija u kojoj je glavni lik neobični, mladi hirurg Šon Marfi, autistični genije koji sve posmatra drugačije od ostalih i koji se iz rodnog Vajominga seli u San Hoze kako bi se zaposlio u prestižnoj bolnici Svetog Bonaventure. Uprkos tome što nema socijalne veštine i ne snalazi se u međuljudskim odnosima i nepoznati su mu pojmovi poput sreće i ljubavi, on je neverovatan stručnjak. Doktor Šon je izuzetno drag i inteligentan, ali ga šef ipak uzima na zub, zbog njegovog direktnosti i nespretnog ponašanja prema pacijentima, međutim, njegova genijlanost je neosporna.

programme.title: Dauntonska opatija
programme.desc: Robert i Kora Krauli nemaju muških potomaka, te će po zakonu njihovo veliko imanje pripasti najbližem rođaku umesto njihovoj kćerki Meri. Međutim, oba potencijalna naslednika stradaju na Titaniku... Robert i Kora Kroli, lord i ledi od Grantama, imaju tri ćerke - Meri, Idit i Sibil, ali nemaju muških potomaka, te će po zakonu njihovo veliko imanje pripasti najbližem rođaku umesto njihovoj najstarijoj kćerki Meri. Ledi Meri je pristala da se uda za svog drugog rođaka Patrika, sina tadašnjeg pretpostavljenog DŽejmsa Krolija. Serija počinje dan nakon potapanja Titanika u aprilu 1912, kada Krolijevi saznaju da su i DŽejms i Ptarik poginuli u potapanju. U potrazi za novim naslednikom, nalaze još daljeg muškog rođaka, Metjua Krolija, advokata, pripadnika srednje klase. Uprkos njihovoj poniznosti i ljupkosti, ne dočekuje ih topla dobrodošlica. Meri i njena baba će iskoristiti svaku priliku da ponize Metjua i njegovu majku Izabel i stave im do znanja da nisu isti nivo. Međutim, grof i grofica će se truditi da se prema njima ophode onako kako dolikuje i kako zaslužuju, pa makar to bilo protivno željama njihovih kćerki i majke. Radnja se u početku usredsređuje na odnos između Ledi Meri i Metjua, koji se odupire prihvaćanju aristokratskog načina života, dok se Ledi Meri opire činjenici da joj se novi naslednik dopada.

programme.title: Mladi Drakula
programme.desc: Samohrani otac grof Drakula iz Transilvanije se seli u Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Samohrani otac, grof Drakula se seli iz Transilvanije u modernu Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Na užas svog oca, Vlad junak serije, ne želi da ujeda, već nastoji da se uklopi sa svojim novopronađenim britanskim prijateljima.

credits.actor: Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay, Richard Belzer, Diane Neal, Dean Winters, Michelle Hurd, Stephanie March, Ice-T

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Adijan Monk je brilijantni privatni detektiv, koji je nakon nervnog sloma posle smrti voljene supruge, otpušten iz policije. Kriminalistička, dramska serija prati slučajeve simpatičnog i sasvim neobičnog detektiva, Adrijana Monka. Monk pati od opsesivno-kompulsivnog poremećaja, od kad je doživeo stres posle smrti supruge. Iako je nakon nervnog sloma otpušten iz policije, njegovo fotografsko pamćenje i fantastična moć opažanja, omogućuju mu da reši slučajeve u kojima je policija nemoćna.

programme.title: Poldark
programme.desc: Britanska, istorijska, dramska serija donosi priču o Rosu Poldarku, koji se posle tri godine provedene u ratu vraća kući, gde više ništa nije kao što je bilo. Britanska, istorijska, dramska serija donosi priču o Rosu Poldarku, koji se posle tri godine provedene u ratu vraća kući, gde više ništa nije kao što je bilo.

programme.title: Mad Men
Momci s Madisona
programme.desc:
Mad Men: Created by Matthew Weiner. With Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser, January Jones. A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0804503/","name":"Mad Men","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTgxNDZlODQtNDcwOC00NWQ5LTljNWMtMDhjY2U5YTUzMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0804503/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Nooshin_Navidi"},"dateCreated":"2010-09-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Impeccable...","reviewBody":"This is a perfect show in every sense. The opening credits & animated intro are themselves works of art, and the creative direction makes the series so visually exquisite that you can't take your eyes off the screen even for a moment lest you miss one of the many perfect vignettes. The haunting opening music sets the stage for masterful sound design, ranging from each episode's musical selections to the subtlest of ambient sounds. The camera-work is nothing short of stunning; it loves each character and makes even the background action interesting. Talented cast and every character is watchable & believable.

For a period piece, 'Mad Men' is remarkably fresh. The show is set in 1960, following a decade of post-WWII recovery which, with the help of rampant consumerism, transformed America from an industrial society into a "leisure society". One of the most rewarding things about the show is how we get to witness the many cracks which had already begun to form in the manicured facade of the '50s, slowly making way for America's rebellion against the manufactured "good life", and resulting in the social & political upheaval of the 1960s and 1970s.

We get to have intimate glimpses into the various components of this process--money, power, politics, sex, race, gender roles-- in a way that makes us feel as if we're actually there in the room with the characters. The show also does a magnificent job of portraying the simultaneous liberation and objectification of women as consumerism rapidly transformed their role in society.

Each and every well-developed character on this show takes his/her turn to unfold in delicate layers. This unfolding is done with pin-point precision and subtlety, and without ever spoon-feeding us. And every new nugget of information is a highly relevant piece of this very addictive puzzle.

~NN","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":224350,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2007-07-19","keywords":"advertising,chain smoking,1960s,new york,drinking","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358316/","name":"Jon Hamm"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005253/","name":"Elisabeth Moss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440229/","name":"Vincent Kartheiser"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026995/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247554/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019701/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1980806/","name":"Matthew Weiner"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi69710105","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a trailer for AMC's "Mad Men.""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bruklin 9-9
programme.desc: Džejk Peralt, nezreli, ali talentovani detektiv iz Bruklina, dolazi u neposredni sukob sa svojim novim zapovednikom, ozbiljnim i strogim kapetanom Rejom Holtom. Tim detektiva iz 99. stanice u Bruklinu dobija novog kapetana Rejmonda Holta, veoma ozbiljnog i strogog komandantnog oficira, za razliku od ranijeg kapetana na koga su se svi u ovoj stanici navikli, i zato nastaje sukob detektiva Paralte i Rejmonda. Ejmi Santijago, vredna detektivka koja se uvek drži knjige, u početku ima kompetativni odnos sa Džejkom zbog brojnih uspeha sa obe strane, a kasnije njihova netrpljivost prerasta u romantičnu vezu. Takođe u ovoj stanici se nalaze detektiv Čarls Bojl, Džejkov najbolji drug, narednik Teri Džefords, veoma snažan i krupan ali osetljiv i porodičan čovek, Roza Dijaz, veoma agresivna i sposobna detektivka, asistentkinja Đina Lineti, veoma duhovit lik u seriji, i dva već starija detektiva koji su sada zaduženi za kancelarijski deo policijskog posla, Hičkok i Skali.

programme.title: Dobri doktor
programme.desc: Američka, medicinska drama u kojoj je glavni lik mladi hirurg Šon Marfi, autistični genije koji na stvari gleda drugačije od ostalih. credits.actor: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero, Joe Lo Truglio

programme.title: Dobri doktor
programme.desc: Američka, medicinska drama u kojoj je glavni lik mladi hirurg Šon Marfi, autistični genije koji na stvari gleda drugačije od ostalih. "The Good Doctor" je američka, medicinska, dramska serija u kojoj je glavni lik neobični, mladi hirurg Šon Marfi, autistični genije koji sve posmatra drugačije od ostalih i koji se iz rodnog Vajominga seli u San Hoze kako bi se zaposlio u prestižnoj bolnici Svetog Bonaventure. Uprkos tome što nema socijalne veštine i ne snalazi se u međuljudskim odnosima i nepoznati su mu pojmovi poput sreće i ljubavi, on je neverovatan stručnjak. Doktor Šon je izuzetno drag i inteligentan, ali ga šef ipak uzima na zub, zbog njegovog direktnosti i nespretnog ponašanja prema pacijentima, međutim, njegova genijlanost je neosporna.

programme.title: Mr. Mercedes
Mr. Mercedes
programme.desc: Mr. Mercedes: Created by David E. Kelley. With Brendan Gleeson, Holland Taylor, Jharrel Jerome, Breeda Wool. Tells the story of a psychopathic killer who drives a stolen Mercedes into a crowd and a recently retired detective who tries to bring him down." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4354880/","name":"Mr. Mercedes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTRhMWE1NjMtZTc0YS00YTU0LTlkYzgtMzE5MGFlZmVjYTFlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Tells the story of a psychopathic killer who drives a stolen Mercedes into a crowd and a recently retired detective who tries to bring him down.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4354880/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shanekolacz"},"dateCreated":"2017-08-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Good King TV Adaptation","reviewBody":"As a fan of Mr. King for many years --and NOT a fan of most of the TV and movie adaptations of his works-- I have to say I was impressed with the pilot episode. The casting of Brendan Gleeson got me in to watch it and thank God nobody asked him to try an American accent (witness what happened when they asked Michael Caine to try that in 'Mr Morgan's Last Love'). Also, it was nice to see Harry Treadaway pop up again after 'Penny Dreadful'. The whole show spoke of quality and good storytelling. I agree that the opening scene was a little gratuitous but it is faithful to the novel and I would rather see this sort of violence represented honestly than stylistically. No illusions that blood and guts aren't spilled when you drive a car through human bodies. I am looking forward to the next episode and have already added it to my weekly TV viewing list.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19979,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2017-08-09","keywords":"killer,stalker,psychopath,mercedes benz,investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0322407/","name":"Brendan Gleeson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0852466/","name":"Holland Taylor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7851611/","name":"Jharrel Jerome"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050201/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0661599/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069651/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005082/","name":"David E. Kelley"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mr. Mercedes: Season 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3930112281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGU5MDcyMzQtYmFmMS00ZGYxLWI5OTUtZTNiOTYzZjFmZDIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGU5MDcyMzQtYmFmMS00ZGYxLWI5OTUtZTNiOTYzZjFmZDIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Mr. Mercedes: Season 3"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mladi Drakula
programme.desc: Samohrani otac grof Drakula iz Transilvanije se seli u Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Samohrani otac, grof Drakula se seli iz Transilvanije u modernu Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Na užas svog oca, Vlad junak serije, ne želi da ujeda, već nastoji da se uklopi sa svojim novopronađenim britanskim prijateljima.

credits.actor: Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay, Richard Belzer, Diane Neal, Dean Winters, Michelle Hurd, Stephanie March, Ice-T

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Adijan Monk je brilijantni privatni detektiv, koji je nakon nervnog sloma posle smrti voljene supruge, otpušten iz policije. Kriminalistička, dramska serija prati slučajeve simpatičnog i sasvim neobičnog detektiva, Adrijana Monka. Monk pati od opsesivno-kompulsivnog poremećaja, od kad je doživeo stres posle smrti supruge. Iako je nakon nervnog sloma otpušten iz policije, njegovo fotografsko pamćenje i fantastična moć opažanja, omogućuju mu da reši slučajeve u kojima je policija nemoćna.

programme.title: Poldark
programme.desc: Britanska, istorijska, dramska serija donosi priču o Rosu Poldarku, koji se posle tri godine provedene u ratu vraća kući, gde više ništa nije kao što je bilo. Britanska, istorijska, dramska serija donosi priču o Rosu Poldarku, koji se posle tri godine provedene u ratu vraća kući, gde više ništa nije kao što je bilo.

credits.actor: Bob Odenkirk, Rhea Seehorn, Jonathan Banks, Michael McKean, Patrick Fabian, Michael Mando, Julie Ann Emery, Jeremy Shamos

programme.title: Mad Men
Momci s Madisona
programme.desc:
Mad Men: Created by Matthew Weiner. With Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser, January Jones. A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0804503/","name":"Mad Men","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTgxNDZlODQtNDcwOC00NWQ5LTljNWMtMDhjY2U5YTUzMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0804503/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Nooshin_Navidi"},"dateCreated":"2010-09-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Impeccable...","reviewBody":"This is a perfect show in every sense. The opening credits & animated intro are themselves works of art, and the creative direction makes the series so visually exquisite that you can't take your eyes off the screen even for a moment lest you miss one of the many perfect vignettes. The haunting opening music sets the stage for masterful sound design, ranging from each episode's musical selections to the subtlest of ambient sounds. The camera-work is nothing short of stunning; it loves each character and makes even the background action interesting. Talented cast and every character is watchable & believable.

For a period piece, 'Mad Men' is remarkably fresh. The show is set in 1960, following a decade of post-WWII recovery which, with the help of rampant consumerism, transformed America from an industrial society into a "leisure society". One of the most rewarding things about the show is how we get to witness the many cracks which had already begun to form in the manicured facade of the '50s, slowly making way for America's rebellion against the manufactured "good life", and resulting in the social & political upheaval of the 1960s and 1970s.

We get to have intimate glimpses into the various components of this process--money, power, politics, sex, race, gender roles-- in a way that makes us feel as if we're actually there in the room with the characters. The show also does a magnificent job of portraying the simultaneous liberation and objectification of women as consumerism rapidly transformed their role in society.

Each and every well-developed character on this show takes his/her turn to unfold in delicate layers. This unfolding is done with pin-point precision and subtlety, and without ever spoon-feeding us. And every new nugget of information is a highly relevant piece of this very addictive puzzle.

~NN","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":224350,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2007-07-19","keywords":"advertising,chain smoking,1960s,new york,drinking","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358316/","name":"Jon Hamm"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005253/","name":"Elisabeth Moss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440229/","name":"Vincent Kartheiser"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026995/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247554/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019701/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1980806/","name":"Matthew Weiner"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi69710105","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a trailer for AMC's "Mad Men.""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bruklin 9-9
programme.desc: Džejk Peralt, nezreli, ali talentovani detektiv iz Bruklina, dolazi u neposredni sukob sa svojim novim zapovednikom, ozbiljnim i strogim kapetanom Rejom Holtom. Tim detektiva iz 99. stanice u Bruklinu dobija novog kapetana Rejmonda Holta, veoma ozbiljnog i strogog komandantnog oficira, za razliku od ranijeg kapetana na koga su se svi u ovoj stanici navikli, i zato nastaje sukob detektiva Paralte i Rejmonda. Ejmi Santijago, vredna detektivka koja se uvek drži knjige, u početku ima kompetativni odnos sa Džejkom zbog brojnih uspeha sa obe strane, a kasnije njihova netrpljivost prerasta u romantičnu vezu. Takođe u ovoj stanici se nalaze detektiv Čarls Bojl, Džejkov najbolji drug, narednik Teri Džefords, veoma snažan i krupan ali osetljiv i porodičan čovek, Roza Dijaz, veoma agresivna i sposobna detektivka, asistentkinja Đina Lineti, veoma duhovit lik u seriji, i dva već starija detektiva koji su sada zaduženi za kancelarijski deo policijskog posla, Hičkok i Skali.

programme.desc:
Mad Men: Created by Matthew Weiner. With Jon Hamm, Elisabeth Moss, Vincent Kartheiser, January Jones. A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0804503/","name":"Mad Men","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTgxNDZlODQtNDcwOC00NWQ5LTljNWMtMDhjY2U5YTUzMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0804503/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Nooshin_Navidi"},"dateCreated":"2010-09-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Impeccable...","reviewBody":"This is a perfect show in every sense. The opening credits & animated intro are themselves works of art, and the creative direction makes the series so visually exquisite that you can't take your eyes off the screen even for a moment lest you miss one of the many perfect vignettes. The haunting opening music sets the stage for masterful sound design, ranging from each episode's musical selections to the subtlest of ambient sounds. The camera-work is nothing short of stunning; it loves each character and makes even the background action interesting. Talented cast and every character is watchable & believable.

For a period piece, 'Mad Men' is remarkably fresh. The show is set in 1960, following a decade of post-WWII recovery which, with the help of rampant consumerism, transformed America from an industrial society into a "leisure society". One of the most rewarding things about the show is how we get to witness the many cracks which had already begun to form in the manicured facade of the '50s, slowly making way for America's rebellion against the manufactured "good life", and resulting in the social & political upheaval of the 1960s and 1970s.

We get to have intimate glimpses into the various components of this process--money, power, politics, sex, race, gender roles-- in a way that makes us feel as if we're actually there in the room with the characters. The show also does a magnificent job of portraying the simultaneous liberation and objectification of women as consumerism rapidly transformed their role in society.

Each and every well-developed character on this show takes his/her turn to unfold in delicate layers. This unfolding is done with pin-point precision and subtlety, and without ever spoon-feeding us. And every new nugget of information is a highly relevant piece of this very addictive puzzle.

~NN","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":224350,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2007-07-19","keywords":"advertising,chain smoking,1960s,new york,drinking","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358316/","name":"Jon Hamm"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005253/","name":"Elisabeth Moss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440229/","name":"Vincent Kartheiser"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026995/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247554/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019701/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1980806/","name":"Matthew Weiner"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi69710105","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEzNTI3ODk0NjZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQyOTg5MDUx._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a trailer for AMC's "Mad Men.""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bruklin 9-9
programme.desc: Džejk Peralt, nezreli, ali talentovani detektiv iz Bruklina, dolazi u neposredni sukob sa svojim novim zapovednikom, ozbiljnim i strogim kapetanom Rejom Holtom. Tim detektiva iz 99. stanice u Bruklinu dobija novog kapetana Rejmonda Holta, veoma ozbiljnog i strogog komandantnog oficira, za razliku od ranijeg kapetana na koga su se svi u ovoj stanici navikli, i zato nastaje sukob detektiva Paralte i Rejmonda. Ejmi Santijago, vredna detektivka koja se uvek drži knjige, u početku ima kompetativni odnos sa Džejkom zbog brojnih uspeha sa obe strane, a kasnije njihova netrpljivost prerasta u romantičnu vezu. Takođe u ovoj stanici se nalaze detektiv Čarls Bojl, Džejkov najbolji drug, narednik Teri Džefords, veoma snažan i krupan ali osetljiv i porodičan čovek, Roza Dijaz, veoma agresivna i sposobna detektivka, asistentkinja Đina Lineti, veoma duhovit lik u seriji, i dva već starija detektiva koji su sada zaduženi za kancelarijski deo policijskog posla, Hičkok i Skali.

programme.title: Dobri doktor
programme.desc: Američka, medicinska drama u kojoj je glavni lik mladi hirurg Šon Marfi, autistični genije koji na stvari gleda drugačije od ostalih. "The Good Doctor" je američka, medicinska, dramska serija u kojoj je glavni lik neobični, mladi hirurg Šon Marfi, autistični genije koji sve posmatra drugačije od ostalih i koji se iz rodnog Vajominga seli u San Hoze kako bi se zaposlio u prestižnoj bolnici Svetog Bonaventure. Uprkos tome što nema socijalne veštine i ne snalazi se u međuljudskim odnosima i nepoznati su mu pojmovi poput sreće i ljubavi, on je neverovatan stručnjak. Doktor Šon je izuzetno drag i inteligentan, ali ga šef ipak uzima na zub, zbog njegovog direktnosti i nespretnog ponašanja prema pacijentima, međutim, njegova genijlanost je neosporna.

programme.title: Mr. Mercedes
programme.desc: Priča o ubici koji vozi ukraden Mercedes sa kojim je uleteo u grupu ljudi i detektivu koji pokušava da ga uhvati. Priča o ubici koji vozi ukraden Mercedes sa kojim je uleteo u grupu ljudi i detektivu koji pokušava da ga uhvati.

programme.title: Mladi Drakula
programme.desc: Samohrani otac grof Drakula iz Transilvanije se seli u Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Samohrani otac, grof Drakula se seli iz Transilvanije u modernu Britaniju sa svoje dvoje dece, Vladom i Ingrid. Na užas svog oca, Vlad junak serije, ne želi da ujeda, već nastoji da se uklopi sa svojim novopronađenim britanskim prijateljima.

credits.actor: Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay, Richard Belzer, Diane Neal, Dean Winters, Michelle Hurd, Stephanie March, Ice-T

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Adijan Monk je brilijantni privatni detektiv, koji je nakon nervnog sloma posle smrti voljene supruge, otpušten iz policije. Kriminalistička, dramska serija prati slučajeve simpatičnog i sasvim neobičnog detektiva, Adrijana Monka. Monk pati od opsesivno-kompulsivnog poremećaja, od kad je doživeo stres posle smrti supruge. Iako je nakon nervnog sloma otpušten iz policije, njegovo fotografsko pamćenje i fantastična moć opažanja, omogućuju mu da reši slučajeve u kojima je policija nemoćna.

programme.title: Poldark
programme.desc: Britanska, istorijska, dramska serija donosi priču o Rosu Poldarku, koji se posle tri godine provedene u ratu vraća kući, gde više ništa nije kao što je bilo. Britanska, istorijska, dramska serija donosi priču o Rosu Poldarku, koji se posle tri godine provedene u ratu vraća kući, gde više ništa nije kao što je bilo.

credits.actor: Bob Odenkirk, Rhea Seehorn, Jonathan Banks, Michael McKean, Patrick Fabian, Michael Mando, Julie Ann Emery, Jeremy Shamos

programme.title: Annabelle
Anabel
programme.desc: Annabelle: Directed by John R. Leonetti. With Annabelle Wallis, Ward Horton, Tony Amendola, Alfre Woodard. A couple begins to experience terrifying supernatural occurrences involving a vintage doll shortly after their home is invaded by satanic cultists." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3322940/","name":"Annabelle","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTQwZmQyYzEtODk5ZC00OTY3LWExMjAtYzRjNWFhNGM3MzBlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A couple begins to experience terrifying supernatural occurrences involving a vintage doll shortly after their home is invaded by satanic cultists.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3322940/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"khanbaliq2"},"dateCreated":"2015-05-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Annabelle isn't offensive. Annabelle is pleasing. And that's good.","reviewBody":"I can't say that Annabelle is a good film. There's nothing original about it. But I can say that I found it to be fine and pleasant to watch. Sure, there are a number of well executed scares, but its 1969 setting and cinematography by James Kniest provide it with a dreamy quality. Annabelle isn't about gore. It's that rare film these days that aims to scare you by building dread with patience and restraint. Director John R. Leonetti should be applauded for this. The best executed sequence occurs at the beginning of the film when we get to see what happens to Mia (Annabelle Wallis) and John Form's (Ward Horton) neighbors through their bedroom window. On the downside the script by Gary Dauberman just doesn't have enough good material for the film's 99 minute running time. Just like in The Conjuring (2013) there is a buildup of scares until the shocking ending, but in Annabelle this becomes repetitive because the scares are practically the same. This didn't bother me much though because Wallis and Horton are charismatic enough actors to make us care about Mia and John. I definitely liked them more than the characters in The Conjuring. It's not hard to realize that Annabelle is influenced by Roman Polanski's Rosemary's Baby. While it's not as good as that 1968 film, Annabelle is still a good time at the movies and I recommend it. The film may seem like a cash grab after the success of The Conjuring, but Leonetti and the actors turned it into something enjoyable.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":152387,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2014-10-03","keywords":"possessed doll,murder,suicide,evil doll,occult","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3917261849","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA5ODA4MDM2NTheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDE3NjUxMjMx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA5ODA4MDM2NTheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDE3NjUxMjMx._V1_.jpg","description":"John Form has found the perfect gift for his expectant wife, Mia -- a rare vintage doll in a pure white wedding dress. \r\nSoon after, their home is invaded by members of a satanic cult, but spilled blood and terror are not all they leave behind. The cultists have conjured an entity so malevolent that nothing they did will compare to the sinister conduit to the damned that is now...Annabelle."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1782235/","name":"Ward Horton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1834115/","name":"Annabelle Wallis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005569/","name":"Alfre Woodard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0502954/","name":"John R. Leonetti"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0449458/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0504531/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2477891/","name":"Gary Dauberman"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

Annabelle is pleasing. And that's good.","reviewBody":"I can't say that Annabelle is a good film. There's nothing original about it. But I can say that I found it to be fine and pleasant to watch. Sure, there are a number of well executed scares, but its 1969 setting and cinematography by James Kniest provide it with a dreamy quality. Annabelle isn't about gore. It's that rare film these days that aims to scare you by building dread with patience and restraint. Director John R. Leonetti should be applauded for this. The best executed sequence occurs at the beginning of the film when we get to see what happens to Mia (Annabelle Wallis) and John Form's (Ward Horton) neighbors through their bedroom window. On the downside the script by Gary Dauberman just doesn't have enough good material for the film's 99 minute running time. Just like in The Conjuring (2013) there is a buildup of scares until the shocking ending, but in Annabelle this becomes repetitive because the scares are practically the same. This didn't bother me much though because Wallis and Horton are charismatic enough actors to make us care about Mia and John. I definitely liked them more than the characters in The Conjuring. It's not hard to realize that Annabelle is influenced by Roman Polanski's Rosemary's Baby. While it's not as good as that 1968 film, Annabelle is still a good time at the movies and I recommend it. The film may seem like a cash grab after the success of The Conjuring, but Leonetti and the actors turned it into something enjoyable.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":152387,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2014-10-03","keywords":"possessed doll,murder,suicide,evil doll,occult","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3917261849","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA5ODA4MDM2NTheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDE3NjUxMjMx._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA5ODA4MDM2NTheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDE3NjUxMjMx._V1_.jpg","description":"John Form has found the perfect gift for his expectant wife, Mia -- a rare vintage doll in a pure white wedding dress. \r\nSoon after, their home is invaded by members of a satanic cult, but spilled blood and terror are not all they leave behind. programme.title: Vampires: Los Muertos
Vampiri 2
programme.desc:
Vampires: Los Muertos: Directed by Tommy Lee Wallace. With Jon Bon Jovi, Cristián de la Fuente, Natasha Gregson Wagner, Arly Jover. A vampire hunter and a priest fight a band of the walking dead in Mexico." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0272147/","name":"Vampires: Los Muertos","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM0Nzg5NzM3MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTEzMDgxMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A vampire hunter and a priest fight a band of the walking dead in Mexico.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0272147/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"uds3"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Likeable trash","reviewBody":"Gotta take my hat off to Carpenter....putting his name up as exec producer here. Gives new meaning to the term low budget! Little more than a juvenile re-make of the original. Vampire Hunter (Jon Bon Jovial), girl who has been bit but not turned....Priest-for-a-partner, snatch of the old "locked into the vampire's wavelength" nonsense and a few sporadically exploding vampires that wouldn't look out of place on Guy Fawkes night!

But man...have a look at the hack editing, the childish and garish colors everywhere (MUST have been made ostensibly for the Mexican video market)the totally awesomely vapid acting....its a classic! For some indefinable reason though, the film takes itself soo seriously its almost enchanting.

In the upshot, about as frightening as Sesame Street, as intelligent as Mike Tyson and as relevant as a 1972 typewriter! The one decent scene...the two girls about to KISS and they wimp out!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7332,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2003-06-27","keywords":"bounty hunter,villainess,massacre,vampire hunter,vampire","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Vampires: Los Muertos","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3990880537","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQyNDEzMWQtZDQzOS00OWJiLThkOTMtYjgxYjAxNTUzMTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQyNDEzMWQtZDQzOS00OWJiLThkOTMtYjgxYjAxNTUzMTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Tristar"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000954/","name":"Jon Bon Jovi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0209246/","name":"Cristián de la Fuente"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0906031/","name":"Natasha Gregson Wagner"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0908890/","name":"Tommy Lee Wallace"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0091365/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010568/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0079140/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0908890/","name":"Tommy Lee Wallace"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="
